title: Remote Veterinary Surgery & Client Care Coordinator
description:
About Us

We are a busy multi-service veterinary practice in Bermuda, providing veterinary care, boarding, grooming, and daycare. Our clinical veterinary team consists of 2 vets and 2 nurses and is committed to high-quality, compassionate care for pets.

We are seeking a Remote Veterinary Surgery & Client Care Coordinator to streamline our surgical bookings, work-ups, appointments and client follow-ups, helping us fill appointment slots efficiently while improving the client experience.

Key Responsibilities

• Proactively schedule surgeries, procedures, diagnostics, consultations, annual checkups and follow-up appointments in the clinic’s veterinary software program (Avimark)

• Manage estimates and pending procedures, contacting clients to book recommended care

• Coordinate recalls for annual exams, dental care, and senior screenings

• Track and refill cancellations and emergency slots promptly

• Maintain an up-to-date appointment tracker and reporting dashboard

• Ensure smooth communication with clients via phone,
, or messaging

• Collaborate with the on-site reception and veterinary team to optimize scheduling

Required Skills & Experience

• Veterinary background preferred (veterinarian, veterinary nurse, assistant, or similar)

• Strong English communication skills (written and spoken)

• Organized, detail-oriented, and proactive

• Comfortable using Avimark or similar practice management software

• Ability to work independently and meet deadlines

• Previous remote work experience is an advantage

Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

• Surgery slot utilisation: 85–90% target

• Tier 1 estimate follow-up: 100% completed

• Tier 2 conversion: 60–75%

• Recalls scheduled: 50–70%

What We Offer

• Flexible remote work

• Opportunity to be part of a high-performing, growing veterinary team

• Structured workflow with clear responsibilities

• Training and ongoing support to succeed in the role



Hours: 40 hours/week (flexible, aligned with Bermuda business hours)



How to Apply

Please send your CV and a brief cover letter explaining your experience in veterinary medicine and scheduling, client care, or remote coordination to: 



Application Deadline: March 15, 2026

title: Experienced Meta Ads Strategist (Ecommerce) – System Audit Role
description:
Hi!



I run a small ecommerce brand and have built a structured Meta testing system (gated testing, disciplined kill/keep/scale rules, naming conventions, UTMs, etc.).



Before I scale further, I want a senior Meta buyer to audit my setup and give honest feedback.



This is not a day-to-day operator role.

This is a strategic audit + advisory role.



I am specifically looking for someone who has worked with multiple ecommerce brands and can compare my system to what they’ve seen across other accounts.



What You’ll Do:



* Audit my Meta account structure (campaigns, ad sets, optimization events, audiences)

* Review my testing workflow and decision rules

* Identify weaknesses, blind spots, or inefficiencies

* Recommend 3–5 highest-impact improvements

* Advise whether I am killing too early or scaling incorrectly



Engagement Structure:



* Paid one-time audit (60–90 minutes + written notes)

* Possible ongoing weekly 30–45 minute advisory call (if strong fit)



Compensation:



* Maximum $15- $20/hour



To Apply (Required):



* Your CV (years running Meta ads and level of responsibility)

* 2–3 ecommerce brands you’ve worked with

* Approximate budget range per account

* What you improved (CPA reduction, scaling, creative testing, structural fixes, etc.)

* How you typically work with clients (hands-on operator vs strategic advisor)



Please note, applications without this information will not be reviewed.

title: Meta Buyer for DTC Brand — $5–8/hr | Must Know Kill/Scale + Funnels
description:
We're a U.S. based fast-moving DTC snack brand that runs lean, tests fast, and learns by the numbers.

We don’t waste ad dollars — we track CTR, ROAS, CAC, and AOV obsessively.

You’ll be the founder’s right-hand executor for Meta ads — not just an uploader, but a growth-minded operator who wants to own results.



#### **What You’ll Do**



* Launch, monitor, and adjust Meta 
/Instagram) ads daily.

* Kill weak ads fast; scale winners confidently.

* Track & report key metrics daily (CTR, CPC, CPP, ROAS) in shared sheets.

* Keep a clean running log of every test: what launched, what worked, what failed.

* Quickly upload and rotate new creatives (ABO/CBO, copy & creative swaps).

* Suggest micro-optimizations based on data, not hunches.



#### **Who You Are**



* 1–3 yrs Meta Ads experience **for DTC / Shopify brands** (not just boosted posts).

* Managed **? $1K/month ad spend** hands-on.

* Understands funnels, kill/scale rules, break-even ROAS.

* Obsessed with performance data and learning why ads work (or flop).

* Hungry, proactive, highly responsive — no hand-holding, no flaking.

* Comfortable with blunt, direct feedback; you like fast test-and-learn loops.



#### **Compensation & Growth**



* **$5–8/hr to start**, based on experience & proven skill.

* **Performance-based raises** and growth into broader paid-media role as we scale.

* Direct weekly check-ins with founder for strategy & feedback.

* Be part of a lean team where every test counts.



#### **Must-Haves**



1. Real Ads Manager experience (ABO/CBO, not boosting).

2. Prior DTC / ecommerce results you can show.

3. Able to explain CTR, CPC, CPP, ROAS in your own words.

4. Execution speed — can swap creatives or kill/scale daily without drama.



#### **How to Apply**

* Link a **screenshot of an ad account** you’ve managed (blur names if needed).

* In **3–4 sentences**, explain: *“If CTR is high but purchases are low, what would you check first?”*

title: Female executive assistant to the CEO
description:
We are seeking a highly organized, proactive, and detail-oriented Virtual Executive Assistant to support the CEO in managing day-to-day operations, strategic initiatives, and personal tasks. This is a fully remote role, ideal for someone who thrives in a fast-paced environment and has a passion for helping a growing business succeed. As the right-hand person to the CEO, you’ll play a key role in streamlining workflows, enhancing productivity, and ensuring seamless communication across teams and clients in the landscaping and home services industry.



Key Responsibilities:

•  Manage the CEO’s calendar, including scheduling meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements, while prioritizing tasks and resolving conflicts.

•  Handle
 correspondence, draft responses, and filter communications to ensure the CEO focuses on high-priority matters.

•  Coordinate with internal teams (e.g., field operations, sales, and finance) and external vendors or clients, particularly for project bids, client follow-ups, and service inquiries.

•  Prepare reports, presentations, and documents related to business performance, such as client proposals, budget summaries, or seasonal planning for landscaping projects.

•  Conduct research on industry trends, competitors, suppliers (e.g., equipment or materials for home services), and potential business opportunities.

•  Assist with preparing quotes for services and following up with clients to ensure satisfaction and secure repeat business.

•  Assist with personal errands and administrative tasks as needed, ensuring a balanced work-life integration for the CEO.

•  Track expenses, manage invoicing, and support basic bookkeeping using tools like QuickBooks or Google Workspace.

•  Organize virtual meetings via Zoom or similar platforms, including agenda preparation and follow-up notes.

•  Handle confidential information with the utmost discretion and professionalism.

title: Video Editor and Social media officer
description:

**Part-Time | 20 Hours Per Week | AUD $8 per Hour**



Nationwide Migration and Education is a fast-scaling Australian migration consultancy based in Brisbane. We are building a dominant digital presence in the migration industry through educational, authority-driven video content across YouTube, TikTok, Instagram,
, and LinkedIn.



We are not looking for an average editor.



We are looking for someone who understands growth, speed, quality, and accountability.



If you are creative, data-driven, disciplined, and serious about long-term growth — this role is for you.



—————————————————————————



### Your Mission



Your core objective is simple:



Help us grow brand authority, engagement, and leads through powerful video content and structured marketing execution.



We produce high-quality 4K educational content focused on employer-sponsored visas, skilled migration, and business migration pathways.



—————————————————————————

• Support production of up to 30–40 short-form videos per month

• Deliver edited content within agreed turnaround times

• Improve hook quality, retention rate, and watch time

• Contribute ideas that increase engagement and inbound enquiries



This is a performance-based culture. We track output and quality.



—————————————————————————

**1. Advanced Video Editing**

• Edit 4K footage using Adobe Premiere Pro or DaVinci Resolve

• Add captions, dynamic hooks, transitions, branding, zoom cuts

• Create short-form content for Reels, TikTok, Shorts

• Design engaging thumbnails

• Ensure clean, professional, authority-style edits



**2. Social Media & Marketing Execution**

• Assist in planning monthly content calendars

• Research migration-related trends

• Analyse performance metrics and suggest improvements

• Assist with posting and scheduling across platforms

• Support website and funnel optimisation suggestions



**3. Growth Contribution**

• Provide a structured 30-day marketing action plan

• Suggest strategies to increase brand visibility

• Think beyond editing — think growth



—————————————————————————



### Technical & Work Requirements



• Minimum 16GB RAM

• High-speed, stable internet connection

• Backup plan for power outages (generator, co-working space, etc.)

• Must be comfortable sharing screen during working hours

• Strong time management and communication skills



—————————————————————————



### Compensation



• AUD $8 per hour

• 20 hours per week

• Long-term opportunity for growth

• Two weeks’ salary held as bond (released at completion of contract)



High performers may receive increased hours and performance-based incentives.



—————————————————————————



### Application Process (Strict)



Incomplete applications will NOT be reviewed.

 with:

3. Explain clearly how you handle power or internet interruptions.

title: Senior Technical SEO Specialist, Google Search Console Indexing Fixes, Hands On Implementation
description:
We need a senior Technical SEO specialist who can both diagnose and fix recurring Google Search Console indexing and sitemap errors. This role requires hands on implementation across CMS settings and website technical configuration, and the ability to work directly in WordPress or equivalent platforms.



This is not a content role. This is technical indexation, crawling, canonicalisation, robots, redirects, and sitemap quality.



What You Will Do:





You will be responsible for end to end resolution, including:



Audit GSC Page Indexing and Sitemaps reports, identify root causes and patterns



Implement fixes directly (not just recommendations), including:



Sitemap cleanup so it includes only canonical, 200 status, indexable URLs



Canonicalisation corrections (site wide rules + page level fixes)



Robots.txt and meta robots corrections



Redirect mapping, redirect chain cleanup, and URL normalisation



Fixing parameter URL index bloat, duplicate URL variants, pagination issues



Addressing soft 404s, thin pages, and non indexable templates



Ensuring correct status codes, headers, and crawlable internal linking



Validate changes via:



URL Inspection, live test, and re crawl verification



Monitoring trends in GSC to confirm issues resolve and do not return



Produce clear documentation of what was changed, why, and how to prevent recurrence



Platforms and Access



You will get access to:





Google Search Console and GA4



WordPress admin and relevant plugins (or other CMS if applicable)



Hosting panel access if needed (cPanel, Cloudways, WP Engine etc)





You must be comfortable working in:





WordPress settings, SEO plugins, sitemap generation, and redirects



Basic server side rules when needed (htaccess or Nginx rules), or working with our dev team to implement server changes



Required Skills



Proven experience fixing indexing issues in Google Search Console, not just reporting them



Strong understanding of:



Status codes, redirects, canonicals, robots directives, sitemaps



Duplicate URL handling and crawl budget issues



Parameter URLs, pagination, faceted navigation problems



Confident using tools like Screaming Frog or Sitebulb



Ability to communicate clearly and keep a log of changes





Nice to Have:





Log file analysis experience



Experience with custom builds and headless sites



Structured data debugging experience

title: Tiktok Posting / Editing Shorter videos. posting ai vids
description:
To attract a high-quality candidate who understands the nuances of the TikTok algorithm and technical requirements (like regional targeting), we need to polish the language while keeping it direct.



Here is a refined version of your job post, structured to attract a professional "Content Creator & Growth Specialist."



Job Title: TikTok Content Creator & Growth Specialist (US Market Focus)

Role Overview

We are looking for a creative and technically savvy TikTok specialist to manage daily postings and drive growth specifically within US-based audiences. You will be responsible for a hybrid content strategy consisting of high-quality AI-generated videos and engaging TikTok slideshows.



Key Responsibilities

Daily Content Publishing: Manage the full end-to-end posting process, ensuring one high-quality post per day.



Regional Growth: Utilize strategies (including VPN/proxy setups or SIM-based methods) to ensure content is consistently pushed to United States audiences.



Content Production: * Create "AI-driven" videos using modern generative tools.



Design high-retention TikTok slideshows using trending audio and AI assets.



Post-Production: High-level editing using CapCut to ensure snappy transitions, clear captions, and viral potential.



Requirements & Qualifications

Proven Experience: Deep understanding of the TikTok algorithm and specific experience in capturing US-based viewers from an international location.



Technical Proficiency: Expert-level skills in CapCut and experience with AI video generation tools.



Equipment: Ideally an iPhone user for native app features, better upload quality, and mobile-first editing.



Self-Sufficient: Able to work independently, manage a daily schedule, and stay on top of rapidly changing TikTok trends.



How to Apply

Please provide:



A brief summary of your experience targeting US audiences.



Examples of TikTok content you have edited (CapCut/AI/Slideshows).



The tools/software you currently use for AI video generation.



A quick tip on the VPN aspect:

TikTok is notoriously good at detecting VPNs and "shadowbanning" or region-locking accounts to the local SIM card's location. When interviewing candidates, you might want to ask if they use US-based SIM cards or residential proxies, as those are generally more effective than a standard VPN for reaching the States.

title: Legal Assistant
description:
# Part-Time Legal Assistant (Australian Migration & Legal Support) – Remote



**20 Hours Per Week | $9 AUD Per Hour**



We are an established Australian migration and education consultancy based in Brisbane, Australia. We operate in a highly regulated legal environment and require exceptional accuracy, confidentiality, and professionalism in everything we do.



We are currently seeking a highly detail-oriented **Part-Time Legal Assistant** based in the Philippines.



This position is ideal for:

• A current Law student (3rd or 4th year preferred), OR

• A recent Law graduate seeking international legal exposure



This is not a casual or short-term role. We are looking for someone serious about growth, accountability, and long-term development.



---



## Working Schedule



• 20 hours per week

• Monday to Friday

• Approximately 4–5 hours per day (fixed shift)



---



## Compensation



• $9 AUD per hour

• Long-term opportunity for the right candidate

• Potential performance-based increases



---



# Key Responsibilities



• Conduct structured legal and policy research (Australian migration law)

• Draft, proofread, and format legal documents

• Prepare summaries of legislation and policy updates

• Review documents for grammatical, factual, and logical errors

• Assist with file management and compliance procedures

• Follow detailed internal processes precisely

• Maintain strict confidentiality at all times



---



# Mandatory Requirements



• Currently studying Law OR recently completed a Law degree

• Strong written and spoken English

• Excellent attention to detail (critical requirement)

• Strong research and analytical skills

• Ability to follow written instructions precisely

• Professional, reliable, and deadline-focused



---



# Highly Regarded



• Experience working with:



* An Australian law firm

* An Australian migration agency

* International legal or compliance work



---



# Technical Requirements (Non-Negotiable)



• Minimum 16GB RAM computer

• Stable high-speed internet

• Backup internet solution (must be explained in application)

• Quiet and professional work environment

• Willingness to share screen while working when required



Applications that do not meet the technical requirements will not be considered.



---



# IMPORTANT – Read Carefully (Attention to Detail Test)



To demonstrate your attention to detail, please include the words:



**“Blue Kangaroo”**



in the first sentence of your cover letter.



Applications without:

• A cover letter

• The required phrase

• Technical details



will be automatically rejected.



---



# Application Instructions



Please submit the following:



1. Your CV



2. A cover letter explaining:



   * Why you are suitable for this role

   * A real example that demonstrates your attention to detail

   * Your experience (if any) with Australian firms

   * Your computer specifications (RAM, processor, device type)

   * Your internet speed (include Mbps)

   * Your backup internet solution



3. Confirm your availability (hours per day and time zone)



---



# Shortlisted Candidates Will Be Required To Complete:



• An attention-to-detail editing task

• A short legal research summary

• A technical setup verification

• A brief  trial task (2 hours)



---



We are looking for someone intelligent, structured, reliable, and serious about building legal experience in an international environment.



If you are confident in your research ability, writing skills, and precision — we would love to hear from you.



Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
 to

title: ai automation
description:
Gemini said

To find a true "Automation Heavyweight," the job post needs to focus on Technical Architecture and API Orchestration. In 2026, TikTok automation is about building a "headless" content studio where the human only acts as the final quality filter.



Here is the updated job post and a specific "Demo Task" you can use to vet their skills.



Job Title: AI Automation Engineer (TikTok Content Systems)

The Goal

Build and maintain a fully automated pipeline that generates high-retention TikTok videos and slideshows, specifically engineered to bypass geographic restrictions and hit the United States algorithm.



Core Responsibilities

Workflow Orchestration: Build end-to-end automations using 
, n8n, or Python to link scripts, image generation, and video assembly.



AI Stack Integration: Connect APIs for GPT-4.5, Midjourney/DALL-E 3, and video tools (like InVideo AI, Runway, or Creatomate) into a seamless workflow.



US Audience Routing: Architect the technical setup (Residential Proxies, Cloud-Phones, or Anti-detect browsers like GoLogin) to ensure the TikTok algorithm identifies all activity as US-native.



Slideshow Automation: Specifically automate the creation of TikTok's "Slideshow" format by auto-generating image assets and syncing them with trending hooks.



Technical Requirements

Automation Expert: Deep experience with API Webhooks, JSON data structures, and multi-step logic.



The "TikTok Hack": Proven ability to manage US-based accounts from an international location without shadowbans.



Mobile-Native: Must understand how to push automated drafts to an iPhone for the final "Human-in-the-loop" polish in CapCut.

title: Social Media Video Clipper, Short Form Content Specialist
description:
We are looking for a highly reliable and detail oriented social media video clipper to work with Veridian Creative, a California based media company producing professional content for corporate brands, advertisements, and weddings.



This role is focused on short form content derived from long form video projects. You will be responsible for identifying strong 
nts, cutting them into high performing clips, and formatting content specifically for platforms like Instagram Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts, and X. This is not a creative director role, but it does require strong instincts, speed, and an understanding of what performs on social platforms.



Your responsibilities include:

• Pulling compelling 
nts from long form videos such as podcasts, brand films, weddings, and commercials

• Creating short form clips optimized for vertical platforms

• Tight, clean cutting with strong pacing and hook driven openings

• Adding basic captions, text, and formatting for social media

• Maintaining consistency with brand tone and creative direction

• Delivering multiple clips quickly and efficiently from each source video



Requirements:

• Prior experience clipping content for social media platforms

• Strong understanding of short form pacing, hooks, and retention

• Ability to follow clear instructions and brand guidelines

• Comfort working with Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or similar software

• Fast turnaround times and dependable communication

• Organized workflow and attention to detail



This role is ideal for someone experienced in short form editing who understands volume, speed, and platform specific formatting. It is not suitable for complete beginners, but it does not require high level color grading or long form storytelling expertise.

title: Home Care - Caregiver Scheduler
description:
About Us



At Helper Heroes, we’re on a mission to provide exceptional care and support to home

care agencies in the U.S. We believe in true partnership where our virtual assistants act

as an extension of the care team. Our goal is to ensure a compassionate, innovative,

and efficient care experience for clients and families alike.



About You



What sets us apart is YOU. You’re not just any virtual tea
mber—you’re a Helper

Hero! If you’re passionate about making a difference, have a knack for organization, and

thrive in a fast-paced, mission-driven environment, you’re who we are looking for. If

you’re the kind of person who loves tackling behind-the-scenes tasks with a smile,

ensuring that our clients and caregivers receive the best possible support, apply today!



About the Role



We’re looking for a detail-oriented Home Care Scheduler to match caregivers with client

visits, fill open shifts fast, and keep the daily schedule smooth. You’ll work closely with

recruiters, care managers, clients, and caregivers to make sure every visit is covered and

logged correctly.



Key Responsibilities



- Build, publish, and maintain daily/weekly schedules for caregivers and clients

- Fill open shifts quickly by calling, texting, and following up with caregivers

- Match caregivers based on skills, availability, location, client preferences, and pay

rates

- Monitor call-outs, late arrivals, and no-shows; arrange immediate coverage and

notify stakeholders

- Confirm new starts, schedule changes, and cancellations with clients and

caregivers

- Update client and caregiver profiles, care plans, and visit notes in the scheduling

system

- Track EVV/clock-ins and resolve exceptions before billing and payroll cutoffs

- Coordinate with recruiters and team leads to forecast coverage needs

- Escalate risks (missed visits, repeated call-outs, client concerns) early

- Provide end-of-day and end-of-week coverage reports and metrics

- (If needed) Support after-hours/on-call rotation for urgent schedule changes



Qualifications



-1+ year of scheduling, dispatch, coordination, or call center experience (home

care, home health, or healthcare preferred)

- Strong English communication skills (phone, text, and
) with a calm, helpful

tone

- Fast, accurate data entry and excellent attention to detail

- Proven ability to juggle many moving parts and stay organized under time

pressure

- Problem solver who can think ahead and act quickly when plans change

- Basic understanding of HIPAA/privacy and client confidentiality

- Comfortable working US business hours; willing to work occasional

evenings/weekends/holidays as needed



Nice-to-Have (Tools & Systems)

Experience with any of these is a plus:



- Scheduling/EVV platforms: WellSky (ClearCare), AxisCare, AlayaCare

- Phone/SMS tools: RingCentral, Dialpad, JustCall, Twilio

- Productivity: Google Workspace or Microsoft 365, Slack/Teams, spreadsheets



Work Setup



- Laptop or desktop

- Reliable internet (at least 25 Mbps), backup connectivity/power recommended

- Quiet workspace and professional phone etiquette



Why You’ll Love Working with Us



- Competitive Base Pay: $6.50/hr for the first 6 months. (Among the highest in the homecare industry)

- Make a Difference: You’ll play a key role in ensuring that clients receive the best

care possible.

- Growth Opportunities: As we grow, so will you! There’s plenty of room for

advancement and learning.

- Fun & Supportive Team: We’re a tight-knit group that values collaboration,

compassion, and a good laugh.



Ready to Be a Hero?



If you’re excited about the opportunity to join our team, where you’ll be appreciated,

have a sense of purpose and inclusion and are willing to help us create a brighter, more

compassionate care experience, we can’t wait to hear from you! Apply today and let’s

make a difference together.



IMPORTANT: Directly apply and send your resume on our website: 
/helperheroes/

If you require constant direction, miss small details, or produce work that needs repeated correction, this is not the right role for you.



?

• First-pass accuracy

• Independent execution

• Strong communication

Raises are based on:

• Individual performance

• Reduced revision rates

• Consistency over time

• Company growth and revenue performance



This role begins with a 7-day paid trial period at $3.00/hour.

Continuation beyond the trial depends on performance.



Payments are issued bi-weekly.



?



Productivity Expectations



This is a production-based role.



You will be expected to:

• Meet clearly defined weekly output targets

• Complete assigned builds within designated timeframes

• Maintain accuracy while meeting productivity standards

• Reduce revision cycles over time



Specific quotas will be discussed based on task complexity. Failure to meet minimum production standards will result in contract termination.



?



Core Responsibilities

• Train AI tools to generate structured, consistent outputs

• Implement permanent fixes (no repeated corrections)

• Maintain structured documentation and detailed notes

• Communicate proactively regarding blockers or inefficiencies

• Exercise strong judgment when d
 to escalate

• Work within company monitoring software (provided) professionally



?



Non-Negotiables



You must:

• Follow instructions exactly as given

• Deliver work that does not require repeated revision

• Be highly organized (no missed builds or steps)

• Communicate clearly and consistently

• Be comfortable with accountability and productivity tracking

• Demonstrate a strong contract history



If your work history includes frequent disputes, incomplete projects, or excessive revisions, do not apply.



?



Screening Test (Mandatory)



To be considered, your proposal must include:

1. The word “Structured” at the top of your proposal.

2. A 4–6 sentence explanation of how you would correct an AI system that repeatedly reverts formatting (example: text color changing back).

3. A 3–5 sentence explanation of how you determine whether to escalate an issue or solve it independently.

4. A rewritten, clearer version of this instruction:

“Make sure you only fix the problem once and don’t let it happen again.”



Proposals that are generic, fail to follow instructions, or appear copy-pasted will be rejected.



?



Long-Term Opportunity



Top performers who:

• Meet productivity quotas

• Eliminate send-backs

• Communicate proactively

• Demonstrate ownership



…will be considered for expanded hours and potential long-term placement as the company grows.

title: Operations Manager
description:
We’re a fast-growing DTC CPG brand looking for an operations manager to help turn the founder's vision into execution. Turning chaos into clarity. Structuring founder ideas. Building processes from scratch. Running and optimizing our agency ecosystem. Owning execution across channels.



WHAT YOU WILL OWN

1. Operational Leadership

- Translate founder notes, ideas, and strategic priorities into structured projects with clear owners and timelines.

- Manage and coordinate our 12+ agencies/contractors (Meta ads, Amazon PPC, Walmart, TikTok - Shop, Socials, Amazon VA, Supply Chain, Retention Marketing, etc.).

- Diagnose underperformance and recommend solutions (augment, hire, fire, restructure).

- Maintain weekly operating cadence so nothing slips through the cracks.



2. Systems Builder / OS Architect

- Build Version 1.0 of our operating system: workflows, SOPs, decision trees, accountability lanes.

- Turn ambiguous initiatives (new SKUs, new channels, new markets) into clear project plans.

- Continuously refine processes — you see broken systems before they break.



3. Founder Enablement

- Protect the founder’s attention by clarifying next steps, eliminating friction, and closing loops.

- Light coordination, no heavy inbox or calendar management.

- Proactively remove blockers and reduce decision fatigue.



WHO YOU ARE

- High judgment — You know what matters vs. noise and escalate only when needed.

- Proactive & self-directed — You don’t wait to be told; you anticipate issues.

- Founder-level ownership — You think like an operator, not a task-taker.

- Structured thinker — You bring clarity to a messy, fast-moving environment.

- Strong communicator — Crisp writing, strong updates, comfortable pushing back.

- High-output — You move at founder pace and close loops quickly.

- Calm under pressure — Fast-growth e-commerce doesn’t rattle you.

- AI-native — You use AI daily for drafting, summarizing, automating, and systemizing.

- E-commerce experience is helpful but not required for high-judgment operators with strong systems thinking.

title: VA Disputer
description:
We are seeking a detail-oriented and experienced Virtual Assistant (VA) specializing in credit repair dispute processing. The ideal candidate will have hands-on experience handling credit disputes, understanding credit reporting laws, and managing client accounts efficiently. This is a full-time remote position requiring accuracy, organization, and confidentiality.



Key Responsibilities:

 • Prepare, review, and submit credit dispute letters to credit bureaus

 • Analyze credit reports for inaccuracies, errors, and negative items

 • Track dispute progress and follow up with bureaus and creditors

 • Maintain organized client files and documentation

 • Communicate updates to clients professionally and promptly

 • Use credit repair software (e.g., Credit Repair Cloud or similar platforms)

 • Ensure compliance with FCRA and other relevant regulations

 • Maintain confidentiality of all client information

 • Meet daily/weekly productivity targets

title: LIDAR PCB Design
description:
Hello! 



I am looking for someone who has experience with PCB design (the software platform is not important). I have a reference design which is known to work, and I need to make some modifications, mostly deletions, and a bit of re-organizing. 



It's a straightforward board with less than 50 unique components, 3 ICs. We'll start the project with a report on what needs to be built to make sure the requirements are clear, and then we'll alter the schematic and select a new emitter and photodiode pair. 



I've worked with a number of Filipino VAs in the past and have always enjoyed the attention to detail and joy brought to work.

title: Full-Time Content Editor & Social Growth Specialist
description:
Full-Time Content Editor & Social Growth Specialist



Monday–Friday | 5 Hours Per Day | Immediate Start



AP Media Sydney is hiring a highly capable, fast-moving Content Editor & Social Growth Specialist to join our team.



This is not an entry-level role. We are looking for someone who understands content velocity, platform psychology, growth strategy, and client acquisition support.



If you know how to make content move, convert, and scale accounts, this role is for you.



Role Overview



You will be responsible for:



• Editing fast-paced, viral-style TikTok and Instagram Reels

• Posting daily content across multiple client accounts

• Managing content calendars and scheduling

• Researching trends and platform-native content strategies

• Executing growth strategies for diverse industries

• Creating professional pitch decks to help secure new clients

• Working independently without constant direction



This role requires speed, initiative, strategic thinking, and strong execution skills.



Core Responsibilities

1. Video Editing (Daily)



• Create high-energy, attention-grabbing TikTok edits

• Apply strong hooks, captions, transitions, and trend alignment

• Deliver fast turnaround edits

• Optimise videos for retention and shareability



2. Social Media Management



• Post daily across multiple client accounts

• Write captions aligned with brand voice

• Understand IG and TikTok growth mechanics

• Research competitors and viral formats

• Identify content angles that can scale reach



3. Photo Editing



• Edit photos using Lightroom

• Experience editing for:

– Nightclubs

– Real estate

– Gyms

– Events & parties

– Hospitality venues



Must understand lighting correction, colour grading, and platform optimisation.



4. Strategy & Research



• If assigned a new client, you must:

– Research their niche

– Analyse competitors

– Identify viral content styles

– Suggest what type of content needs to be filmed

– Help build a content direction



You are expected to think strategically, not just execute tasks.



5. Pitch Deck & Client Support



• Create professional pitch decks for potential clients

• Structure decks with clear strategy, deliverables, and outcomes

• Present content direction and growth opportunities visually

• Assist in preparing proposals for new business opportunities



You must understand how to communicate value, not just create slides.



6. Organisation & Systems



• Create and manage Google Sheets

• Track deliverables and posting schedules

• Multi-task across several client accounts

• Keep workflows structured and organised



Who We’re Looking For



You must:



• Understand TikTok and Instagram growth deeply

• Be able to work Monday–Friday (5 hours per day)

• Be flexible when needed for urgent edits

• Work independently without being micromanaged

• Be solution-oriented and resourceful

• Be fast, reliable, and consistent

• Be confident building structured pitch decks



If you need constant supervision, this role is not suitable.



Compensation



$150 AUD per week flexible

Paid weekly



This is a long-term, full-time position for the right candidate who wants to grow with AP Media Sydney.



About AP Media Sydney



AP Media Sydney works across nightlife, events, fitness, hospitality, real estate, and personal brands. We operate in fast-moving environments where content needs to be sharp, relevant, and platform-optimised.



We value speed, ownership, and execution.



How to Apply



Send:



• Your portfolio (TikTok / Instagram work)

• Examples of viral edits you have created

• Examples of accounts you have helped grow

• Examples of pitch decks you have created

• Your experience using Lightroom

• A short paragraph explaining why you are a good fit



Only serious applicants who understand content growth and business development will be considered.



AP Media Sydney

Where content meets scale.

title: Remote Property Manager (USA) – Flexible Hours, Career Growth, and Opportunity!
description:
**We're Hiring: Experienced Property Manager (Remote, U.S.-Based)**

**???? Full-Time | ? Flexible Hours with Set Shift but also must be on call | ???? Hiring Immediately**

**???? Starting Pay: \$2–\$5/hr, depending on experience and performance** Room to grow as well in our family run company.



---



Hi there,

Thanks for your interest. We’re currently hiring a facts-driven, experienced **manager** to join our growing **property management company**.



We love working with great energy, meticulous, thoughtful people. This role is not just about responding quickly — it's about responding **accurately and intelligently**. If you're someone who **takes time to understand the issue**, checks the facts - we have lots of Strategic Operating Plans that must be followed and guests' must be listened to, and our manager doesn't jump to conclusions — you move with strategy, you'll thrive here. You must also have the best attitude you can be a star but if you have a bad attitude you won't last. Our culture of respect is too important.



We are **not** looking for someone who rushes through tasks, sends vague or reactive messages, thinks they know more than us or anyone else, or lacks attention to detail. This role requires intelligent, intuition skills, **critical thinking**, **strong communication**, self-started, great availability, and **professional follow-through**.



---



### ? Important Requirements



* **You must have real management experience** — in property, hospitality, operations, or similar

* You must be **fact-oriented and thorough** — the kind of person who investigates before responding

* **Fluent, polished English** (spoken and written) is absolutely essential

* Be able to **respond within 3 minutes** during your shift when needed

* Must be **U.S.-focused** (preferably aligned with Pacific Time or flexible hours)



> Experience in **claims, disputes, or resolution handling** is a plus — not required, but helpful, as we value professionals who know how to gather the facts, understand different sides, and respond with clarity. What's most important is your availability, attitude, and experience in leading.



---



### ???? About the Role



You’ll 
 our real estate brand in the Greater Palm Springs area, with core property management duties — coordinating guests, vendors, and listings. Down the line you’ll likely also help users access documents through our second company, **RER Lifestyle Contracts**, which provides support for contracts related to real estate and services.



This is a long-term role with career growth potential.



---



### ???? Key Responsibilities



**1. Property Management**



* Manage guest communications and vendor coordination is the bulk of it

* Be on call and have a schedule

* Oversee cleanings, maintenance, and track to-dos

* Organize property photos and write compelling listing copy

* Keep accurate records in our cloud storage

* and provide consistent follow-up and self-starter



**2. Owner Outreach & Communication**



* In free time call property owners (e.g., from Zillow) to introduce our corporate rental offerings

* Speak professionally, with confidence and clarity on the phone

* Explain value clearly, and listen closely to owner needs



**3. RER Lifestyle Contracts – Access Support when this company needs it which may not be now**



* Help clients navigate our contract platform and access their documents

* Answer questions thoroughly and professionally

* Troubleshoot issues calmly and efficiently



**4. Optional Growth (for qualified candidates)**

If you have experience in marketing, outreach, or influencer work, you may also help with:



* Local influencer outreach and engagement

* Outreach messaging, script writing, and engagement strategy

* Social media coordination or city guide development



---



### ? Ideal Candidate Traits



* **Management experience** — property, operations, or hospitality required

* **Excellent English** — written and spoken, polished and professional

* **Process-driven** — you ask the right questions and think before reacting

* **Detail-oriented** — you catch what others miss

* **Fact-checking mindset** — you research before replying

* **Calm under pressure** — able to handle urgent issues without panic

* **Self-starter** — proactive and highly organized

* **Client-focused** — you care about quality and experience

***Team Lead** --- you are great at balancing tea
mbers strengths and communication with all stakeholders

***You are available as needed and committed 100% to long-term growth

***You value team culture and never are rude or dismissive to your boss or team leads



---



### ???? Why Join Us?



* Work directly with the founder of two growing brands and other stars

* Be part of an agile, modern property management company

* Contribute to a platform focused on lifestyle, quality, and innovation

* Learn new skills and grow into a larger role over time



---



### ???? Starting Pay: \$2–\$5/hour



Rate depends on experience, performance, and reliability. Raises available after successful trial period. **This is a career opportunity**, not a short-term gig.



---



### ???? To Apply:



Send your **resume** and a short message introducing yourself. Tell us **why you’re a fit**, specifically noting your **management background** and how you handle **fact-gathering and communication.**



---



**DO NOT APPLY IF:**



* You don’t have management experience

* You rush through communication or overlook details

* You’re not fluent in English

* You’re not available consistently during U.S. hours or can’t respond quickly

* You’re looking for a purely social media role — this is a **property management** position first

title: GoHighLevel + Zapier Automation Builder — Sales Funnel + Client Onboarding + Fulfillment Tracking (Deadline: March 25)
description:
We’re a Canadian wedding photo/video studio with profitable lead generation (Meta/IG) and strong close rates, but we need the backend system upgraded: clean lead routing, fast follow-ups, consult booking automation, proposal/deposit tracking, onboarding, and fulfillment tracking.



The owner is traveling starting March 23, so we need a builder who can implement and test a reliable v1 so sales keep closing and clients keep moving while we’re on the road.



Goal / Definition of Done (by March 23)

By March 23, we have a “travel-proof” system where:



Leads are captured, tagged, and routed correctly (premium vs team vs not a fit)



A 60-day SMS/email nurture runs with clean logic and stop conditions



Consult scheduling flow runs end-to-end (confirmations, reminders, pre-call intake)



Proposal/estimate stage is tracked with reminders + “pending signature/deposit” visibility



Won clients are onboarded automatically (welcome + forms + timeline/vendor info intake)



Fulfillment is tracked end-to-end (Upcoming ? Shot ? Editing ? Review ? Delivered ? Archived)



Dashboards show what’s due, what’s late, and what needs owner attention



Scope: What You’ll Build



1) Lead Intake + Routing



Standardize lead capture fields (date, location, budget range, vibe/priorities)



Auto-create opportunity + apply tags + set pipeline stage



Routing logic:



Premium (owner-led) vs Team coverage vs Not Fit



Lost lead tagging + loss reason tracking (for reporting/optimization)



2) 60-Day Sales Nurture Engine (SMS +
)



Build a 60-day experience:



day-0 speed-to-lead response



day 1/2/4/7/14/21 follow-up cadence



longer nurture for the remaining window



Separate sequences for:



Leads who booked a consult



Leads who didn’t book



Leads who received a proposal



Cold leads (light touch)



Clean stop conditions to prevent spam/overlap



3) Consult Scheduling + Pre-Call Prep



Confirmation + reminders (24h / 3h / 15 min)



Pre-call intake workflow (collect venue, priorities, timeline basics)



Generate a simple “Call Brief” note format for the owner



4) Proposals / Estimates / Deposit Tracking



Pipeline stages + automations for:



Proposal sent



Pending signature



Pending deposit



Won



Reminder logic for overdue signature/deposit



“Pending Signature / Pending Deposit” scoreboard view



5) Client Onboarding



Automated welcome + expectations + “what happens next”



Intake forms: timeline, vendor list, addresses, music preferences (if video)



Final call scheduling logic + reminders



6) Fulfillment Tracking (Operations)



Fulfillment pipeline:



Won ? Upcoming ? Shot ? Editing ? Review ? Delivered ? Archived



Simple task templates and internal alerts when items are overdue



Optional: Slack/email notifications when “Late” status is triggered



7) Documentation + Handoff



Simple SOP + Loom walkthroughs:



how the system works



tags/stages meaning



how to troubleshoot common issues



Tools (Required)



GoHighLevel (pipelines, workflows, conversations, calendars)



Zapier (filters/paths/data formatting; webhooks if needed)



Slack (or similar) for notifications



Nice-to-Haves



Appointment-setting funnel experience



Experience building “setter + closer” workflows



Experience with service businesses (agencies, studios, local services)



Timeline



Start ASAP



Stable v1 must be ready before March 23



To Apply (Answer These)



Share 1–2 examples of GoHighLevel workflows you built (screenshots or brief summary).



What are 3 common causes of broken automations in GHL and how do you prevent them?



Describe your approach to routing logic (premium vs team vs not fit).



Can you deliver a tested v1 before March 23? Yes/No.

title: Prospecting & Data VA (B2B Lead Generation / List Building)
description:
# Prospecting & Data VA (B2B Lead Generation / List Building) – Full Time



## About the Role



I’m looking for a **detail-oriented, reliable Prospecting & Data VA** to help me build targeted lead lists for my business funding company.



This is **not** a generic admin VA role.



Your main job will be to help me build clean, accurate, qualified prospect lists so I can focus on outreach, sales conversations, and growing the business.



If you are strong in **web research, lead generation, list building, data cleanup, and spreadsheets**, this could be a great long-term role.



---



## What You’ll Be Doing (Primary Responsibilities)



* Researching businesses based on my target criteria (industry, location, type of business, etc.)

* Finding decision-makers (owner, founder, manager, etc.)

* Building clean prospect lists in Google Sheets / Excel

* Finding and organizing contact information 
, phone, website, social profiles)

* Verifying and cleaning data (remove duplicates, fix formatting, improve accuracy)

* Segmenting leads by niche / state / campaign type

* Preparing lists for outreach and CRM import

* Following clear instructions and SOPs consistently

* Sending a simple daily report of completed work



---



## Example of Data Fields You May Collect



* Business Name

* Contact Name

* Job Title

*
 Address (verified if possible)

* Phone Number

* Website

*
 Page / LinkedIn URL

* City / State

* Industry / Tag

* Notes / Source Link



---



## Tools / Skills (Preferred)



Experience with any of the following is a plus:



* LinkedIn Sales Navigator

* 

* Hunter / NeverBounce (or other
 verification tools)

* Google Sheets / Microsoft Excel

* CRM tools (HubSpot, Salesforce, GoHighLevel, etc.)

* Web research / data mining / list building



You do NOT need to know every tool listed above, but you must be:



* very good at research

* organized

* detail-oriented

* fast learner

* consistent



---



## Who This Role Is Best For



You may be a great fit if you:



* Have experience in **B2B lead generation or web research**

* Care about **data quality**, not just volume

* Can follow lead criteria exactly

* Communicate clearly and ask good questions

* Can work independently after instructions are given

* Want a stable, long-term role with growth potential



---



## Compensation / Schedule



* Part time and full time available

* Rate: Based on experience and quality

* Long-term opportunity for the right person



---



## Important: How to Apply (Read Carefully)



To apply, please send the following:



1. A short intro about your lead generation / research experience

2. The tools you have used (Apollo, LinkedIn, Hunter, etc.)

3. Your internet speed and computer specs

4. Your preferred hourly rate

5. The word **“PIPELINE”** at the top of your application (so I know you read everything)

6. A sample of a lead list you’ve built before (if available)



### Bonus (Optional)



In 3–5 sentences, explain **how you would find 10 restaurant owners in Florida** and what data fields you would collect.



---



## What Happens Next



Qualified applicants may be invited to complete a **paid test task** (small lead research/list-building assignment) so I can choose based on real work quality, not just profile descriptions.



If you’re accurate, dependable, and good at finding quality prospects, I’d love to hear from you.

/Instagram Ads)

title: EOS Integrator / Chief of Staff
description:
We’re a fast-growing DTC CPG brand looking for an EOS-style Operator to help turn the founder's vision into execution.



This is NOT a Project Manager or Executive Assistant job. It’s a hybrid Chief of Staff/ Integrator role — ideal for someone who can think strategically and roll up their sleeves as we scale.



WHAT YOU WILL OWN

1. Operational Leadership

- Translate founder notes, ideas, and strategic priorities into structured projects with clear owners and timelines.

- Manage and coordinate our 12+ agencies/contractors (Meta ads, Amazon PPC, Walmart, TikTok - Shop, Socials, Amazon VA, Supply Chain, Retention Marketing, etc.).

- Diagnose underperformance and recommend solutions (augment, hire, fire, restructure).

- Maintain weekly operating cadence so nothing slips through the cracks.



2. EOS-Style Integrator Work

- Prioritize what truly matters and shield the founder from noise.

- Make judgment calls independently when the founder is offline.

- Push back on agencies, ask strategic questions, and ensure work aligns with our quarterly goals/Rocks.

- Connect dots across marketing, ops, supply chain, and product so we stay aligned.



3. Systems Builder / OS Architect

- Build Version 1.0 of our operating system: workflows, SOPs, decision trees, accountability lanes.

- Turn ambiguous initiatives (new SKUs, new channels, new markets) into clear project plans.

- Continuously refine processes — you see broken systems before they break.



4. Founder Enablement

- Protect the founder’s attention by clarifying next steps, eliminating friction, and closing loops.

- Light coordination, no heavy inbox or calendar management.

- Proactively remove blockers and reduce decision fatigue.



WHERE IS THIS ROLE TODAY

Hands-on operational leadership. Turning chaos into clarity. Structuring founder ideas. Building processes from scratch. Running and optimizing our agency ecosystem. Owning execution across channels.



WHERE THIS ROLE EVOLVES (6- 12 Months)

As systems mature and a PM/EA layer is added beneath you, this becomes a true Integrator seat:

- Running L10s

- Owning Scorecards

- Driving Rocks

- Leading cross-functional accountability

- Supporting strategic planning

- You will play a key role in shaping that evolution.



WHO YOU ARE

- High judgment — You know what matters vs. noise and escalate only when needed.

- Proactive & self-directed — You don’t wait to be told; you anticipate issues.

- Founder-level ownership — You think like an operator, not a task-taker.

- Structured thinker — You bring clarity to a messy, fast-moving environment.

- Strong communicator — Crisp writing, strong updates, comfortable pushing back.

- High-output — You move at founder pace and close loops quickly.

- Calm under pressure — Fast-growth e-commerce doesn’t rattle you.

- AI-native — You use AI daily for drafting, summarizing, automating, and systemizing.

- E-commerce experience is helpful but not required for high-judgment operators with strong systems thinking.

title: Prop Firm Trader (FX/Futures/Crypto)
description:
Hello Traders!



Isla Capital is expanding, and we are looking for disciplined, experienced prop firm traders to join our growing team. We are seeking professionals who can trade evaluation and funded accounts with established prop firms such as FTMO, Apex, Alpha Capital Group, or similar companies.



This opportunity is for traders who understand prop firm rules, practice strong risk management, and can trade consistently. Over time, this role will grow into live portfolio management.



Responsibilities:

• Trade prop firm evaluation and funded accounts

• Follow all prop firm rules and drawdown limits strictly

• Maintain daily trading journals

• Provide regular performance reports



Requirements:

• Proven experience trading prop firm accounts

• Strong discipline and risk management skills

• Ability to work independently

• Honest and reliable communication

• Knowledge of scalping and/or day trading strategies



Compensation:

• Base salary

• Bonus for passing evaluations

• Profit-sharing on funded account payouts

• Large performance bonuses tied to payout milestones



This is a performance-driven opportunity for serious traders who want to grow long-term with a professional trading operation. Our mission is to help Filipino traders earn meaningful income for themselves and their families.



Important Notes:

• Accounts must be registered under the trader’s name per prop firm requirements; however, all accounts and profits belong to Isla Capital

• All prop firm fees and costs will be covered by Isla Capital

• Strict confidentiality is required



To apply, please send:

• A brief introduction about yourself

• Your prop firm trading experience

• Your trading style and psychological approach

• Resume or link to resume (if available)

• Include the word "TRADER" at the start of the message so we know you read until the end.



Let’s build something great and make money together!!

title: Admin/CSR Support
description:
Admin Support (Remote | Full-Time)



Schedule: Must be available starting 8:00 AM PST



About the Role



We’re a U.S.-based fulfillment and prep company supporting e-commerce brands. We’re looking for a dependable, experienced Admin Support tea
mber who takes ownership of their work and communicates clearly.



The work itself is straightforward  but this is a fast-moving environment. Attention to detail, consistency, and accountability are essential.



We need someone steady. When things get busy or challenging, we need someone who steps up, not someone who disappears.



What You’ll Be Doing



Responding to
s and messages

Assisting with client onboarding

Communicating clearly with clients and internal team

Taking phone calls when needed

Following processes and keeping records organized

Proactively following up on leads and tasks



Non-Negotiables



Proven customer support experience

Strong comprehension and communication skills (written and verbal English)

Tech-savvy and comfortable learning new tools quickly

Dependable, punctual, and able to work fixed hours

Comfortable speaking on the phone when needed

Accountable. You take responsibility without needing constant reminders



Resilient. When things get busy or difficult, you stay focused and solution-oriented



Work-From-Home Requirements



Applicants must already have:

Reliable computer or laptop (not tablet/phone-only setup)

Stable internet connection suitable for calls and video meetings

Headset or headphones with working microphone





Nice-to-Haves (Trainable)



Experience with:

Zendesk

Asana

ShipHero

Google Workspace

WhatsApp

Slack



Important Notes (Please Read Carefully)

This is a full-time role with fixed working hours

You must be available starting 8:00 AM PST

This is not a flexible-hours position

This role is best suited for someone seeking long-term stability and growth



This Role Is Not for You If



You are juggling multiple jobs during the same hours

You struggle with written or spoken English

You need constant supervision

You tend to quit when things get stressful or demanding



Pay

Hourly, competitive for the role and scope, based on experience.



Application Instructions (Required)

We receive a high volume of applications. To keep the process fair and efficient, please follow the instructions below:



Written Question:

Why are you interested in this role at Proven Prep, and how does the 8:00 AM PST schedule fit into your current availability?

Please answer in your own words. Do not submit AI-generated responses.



Short Voice Recording (1–2 minutes):



Introduce yourself



Share why you’re interested in this role

Confirm that the schedule works for you



Important:

We are looking for someone who views this as a long-term opportunity, not a short-term placeholder.



Please do not follow up on your application. Due to the number of applicants, we will reach out directly through this platform if we would like to proceed.

title: Can your words make shoppers feel calm, safe, and seen? – E-Commerce Copywriter Wanted
description:
We’re Conscious Items — a fast-growing lifestyle and ecommerce brand that’s served over 600,000 customers and built a community of 300,000+ followers on
 and Instagram.



We’re looking for a direct-response copywriter who can write high-performing ad copy — not blogs, not captions.

Someone who understands angles, hooks, and conversion psychology just as much as words.





What’s in it for you

• Long-term, full-time position with a stable international brand

• Opportunity to grow into a Creative Director role

• Work directly with the founder on creative strategy and testing

• Freedom to test new ideas, messaging angles, and emotional storytelling

• Bonuses for winning ads and proven results





Responsibilities

• Write
, Instagram, and
 ads that stop scrolls and drive sales

• Develop campaign angles and A/B test variations that scale profitably

• Craft landing page copy and headlines that convert

• Analyze what makes copy work (and why) to improve future campaigns

• Collaborate with designers to align visuals and message flow





Requirements

• Minimum 2 years in performance or direct-response copywriting (agency or ecommerce brand preferred)

• Strong understanding of marketing psychology, hooks, and offers

• Knows how to write short-form copy that sells — not long articles

• Experience with wellness, lifestyle, or DTC brands is a plus

• Full-time preferred (part-time possible for the right fit)





Compensation



$1,000 – $2,000 USD/month, depending on skill, experience, and performance.

We pay above industry average for proven ad copywriters who can think strategically and write persuasively.

Performance bonuses for top-performing ads and campaigns.





How to Apply

1. Write a short intro explaining why you’re great at ad copy (not blogs).

2. Share 3–5 samples of your ad or sales copy (no blog posts please).

3. Write 1-5 10-word hook you’d test for our best-seller, the Triple Protection Bracelet (
/products/triple-protection-bracelet).

4. Include the word Energy somewhere in your message to confirm you read everything.





We’re not looking for a content writer.

We’re looking for a creative strategist who writes words that move emotions — and sales.



Apply now and let’s create something extraordinary together.



—

Ondrej

Founder, Conscious Items

title: Video Editor - Long-Form Educational YouTube
description:
Ongoing Weekly Work | Systems-Based Editing



We run RealVideo.pro, a video editing company that works exclusively with real estate agents and mortgage brokers producing long-form educational YouTube content.



This is not a creative agency role.

This is a structured, repeatable editing position inside a defined system.



Before applying, please review the editing style here so you understand exactly what we produce:


/watch?v=_3hAFqpUcMQ



What The Work Involves



You will be editing:



• 6 to 12-minute YouTube talking-head videos

• Most average 7 to 9 minutes

• Clean cuts with strong pacing

• Removal of filler words and dead space

• Basic audio cleanup and leveling

• Simple color correction

• Light, intentional b-roll only when it supports the message

• Clean lower thirds when required, meaning simple and professional on-screen text that supports the message without flashy animation

• Occasional simple on-screen text



No heavy motion graphics.

No flashy transitions.

No overproduction.



The goal is clarity, professionalism, and audience retention.



Workflow & Expectations



• 24-hour maximum turnaround

• Clear preset style guide provided

• Repeatable system

• Ongoing weekly volume for the right editor



We value reliability, communication, and consistency. Editors who thrive inside structured systems tend to do very well here.



This role requires someone who is highly detail oriented and comfortable following clear guidelines precisely.



You must also:



• Be comfortable using Google Drive. Vimeo Collaboration. Trello

• Have a Gmail and Google Drive account

• Have WhatsApp for communication

• Have a PayPal account for payment



Compensation



• $25 CAD flat rate per completed video

• Non-negotiable

• Paid monthly via PayPal

• Steady, repeatable work



This role is ideal for someone who prefers stable, predictable work rather than constant creative experimentation.



Who This Is For



You are a strong fit if you:



• Follow detailed style guidelines

• Pay attention to small details

• Remember the word "Detailed"

• Communicate clearly in English

• Respect deadlines

• Prefer structured workflows

• Want long-term, consistent work



This is not a fit for editors who:



• Want full creative control

• Over edit

• Frequently miss deadlines

• Need constant direction



How To Apply



If this sounds like a fit, complete the application form here:


/forms/contact-form-s9mr74



Important: To confirm you have read this posting carefully, enter the word “detailed” in the last question of the application form.



Thoughtful, complete answers help us evaluate not just technical ability, but communication skills, clarity of thinking, and how well you follow instructions, which are critical when working with professional clients. Remember the word Detailed



We look forward to reviewing your application.

title: Accountant/ Bookeeper
description:
Breton Avenir is a fast-growing U.S.-based commercial construction company known for building stylish, high-end retail stores and restaurants across the country. We’re proud to have talented Filipinos already thriving on our team, and we’re looking for more skilled, passionate individuals to grow with us! At Breton Avenir, we prioritize health, safety, and teamwork, making sure every member feels valued, supported, and set up for success. Our culture is professional, friendly, and collaborative, where your ideas matter and your efforts are appreciated. If you’re ready for a stable, long-term opportunity with a company that cares, this is your sign to apply now







Job Title: Construction Accountant / Estimator / Bookkeeper

Job Type: Full-Time

Work Hours: 7:00 AM – 3:00 PM EST

Location: Remote

________________________________________

Roles & Responsibilities:

• Maintain accurate financial records and reports for ongoing construction projects.

• Process and manage accounts payable, receivable, payroll, and bank reconciliations.

• Track budgets, job costs, and project-specific expenses.

• Issue invoices, follow up on collections, and handle vendor payments.

• Assist in preparing cost estimates, take-offs, and pricing for bids.

• Manage documentation such as POs, subcontractor invoices, receipts, and contracts.

• Support Project Managers with cost tracking and financial reporting.

• Prepare monthly financial statements and job cost reports.

• Ensure timely submission of tax reports and compliance documentation.

________________________________________

Qualifications & Traits:

• 4–10 years of relevant experience in construction accounting and estimation.

• U.S. construction experience is a plus, but not mandatory.

• Strong knowledge of job costing, construction billing, and project budgeting.

• Proficiency in QuickBooks or other accounting software.

• Detail-oriented, highly organized, and able to manage multiple tasks simultaneously.

• Excellent communication skills and ability to work independently.

• Familiarity with construction-related documents (e.g., subcontracts, lien waivers, COIs) is an advantage



If you're looking for a new challenge and are ready to bring your expertise to a dynamic team, we'd love to hear from you. Please send your CV and any questions you may have to

title: Tiktok Video Editor
description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES INCLUDE BUT ARE NOT LIMITED TO:

Short-Form Video Editing (Primary)

*Edit 5–20+ short-form videos per day optimized for TikTok and TikTok Shop

*Edit short video/audio podcast (2 episodes a month)

*Create tight, fast-paced edits where cuts feel natural and almost unnoticeable

*Incorporate:

**Multiple camera angles

**Product close-ups

**Usage demonstrations

**On-screen text and captions that improve retention and conversions

*Enhance videos to match a more premium, brand-friendly aesthetic (lighting, color, polish)

*Adapt edits to current TikTok creative trends and algorithm preferences

*Utilize preferred settings in CapCut and suggest others that would make content better



Creative Input & Optimization

*Provide creative suggestions such as:

**What shots are missing

**When pacing needs to be faster

**When structure should change to improve hook and retention

*Help improve content quality and viewer retention over time, not just execute instructions



Fast Turnaround & Workflow

*Deliver edits on very tight timelines, often within 24 hours

*Organize files, exports, and versions efficiently

*Work within a fast-changing content schedule that may shift daily



AI-Assisted Editing & Localization (Future Phase)

*Learn and use AI tools to:

**Speed up editing workflows

**Assist with repurposing content

**Support future Spanish-language versions using AI voice and lip-sync tools (training provided)

*Follow new AI-based workflows as systems are implemented



Cross-Platform Repurposing (Secondary)

*Prepare videos for reposting on:

**Instagram Reels

*
 Reels

*Maintain correct formats, captions, and technical specs per platform



EXPERIENCE AND SKILLS REQUIRED:

*3+ years of video production experience

*Experience with remote team tools like Time Doctor, Slack, Trello, Google Suite, LastPass,
 and Zoom

*Excellent English skills, and able to communicate well both verbally and in writing

*Proven expertise in editing short-form TikTok content, with advanced proficiency in CapCut. (not YouTube-style long-form)

*Strong understanding of:

**TikTok pacing and hooks

**Product-driven storytelling

**TikTok Shop style content

*Ability to edit:

**Talking-head videos

**Product demos

**Lifestyle shots

**Voiceover videos

*Strong eye for:

**Timing

**Visual flow

**Brand presentation

*Content that converts sales and retains viewers

*Comfortable working in a high-volume, fast-paced environment

*Open to learning and using AI tools to improve efficiency

*Excellent organization and file management



TECH REQUIREMENTS:

*Computer - at least i7 or equivalent with 16gb RAM

*Internet Speed - At least 100 MBPS Download speed



Job Type: Part-Time (potentially move into full-time depending on business needs and performance ) - 4 hours daily / 20 hours weekly

Schedule: 3PM-7PM EST M-F // 4AM-8AM PHT

Salary Range: PHP 30,000- PHP 40,000 monthly, Depending on experience





Application Instruction:

Fill out this form: 
/appqNAvkEQ10YFlc3/pagJrwfOxAazQ6fT8/form

After submitting the form, click the apply button and send us a short message on why you would be a good fit for the role.

title: APPOINTMENT SETTER
description:
**Position: Appointment Setter**



**Company:** American Income Life



**Job Type:** Full-Time / Part-Time

**Location:** Remote





 **Job Overview**



We are seeking motivated and professional Appointment Setters to support our licensed agents by scheduling appointments with qualified leads. This role focuses strictly on setting appointments — no selling required.



Appointment Setters will be contacting provided leads that include:



* Union members

* Credit union members

* Association members

* Current American Income Life policyholders



Your primary responsibility is to connect with these individuals, provide a brief overview of the purpose of the call, and schedule a time for them to speak with one of our licensed agents.



---



### **Responsibilities**



* Make outbound calls to provided leads

* Professionally introduce the purpose of the call

* Schedule appointments for licensed agents

* Accurately document call outcomes and appointments

* Maintain a positive and professional tone on every call

* Meet daily and weekly appointment-setting goals



---



**Qualifications**



* Previous customer service experience (any industry)

* Prior phone experience preferred (call center, collections, sales support, scheduling, etc.)

* Strong verbal communication skills

* Clear and confident speaking voice

* Reliable internet connection and quiet work environment

* Self-motivated and dependable



---



**Compensation**



* Competitive hourly pay and/or performance-based incentives (details discussed during interview)





**Application Process**



To be considered, applicants must submit a short voice recording introducing themselves and explaining their previous customer service or phone experience. This recording is required before the hiring manager will schedule an interview.



---



If you are professional, confident on the phone, and enjoy helping connect clients with the right representative, we encourage you to apply.

title: Short-term Rental Guest Reservations Manager
description:
About the Role



As a Short-term Rental Guest Reservations Coordinator, you will play a key role in creating seamless and memorable guest experiences across our holiday accommodation portfolio. Serving as the first point of contact, you’ll represent the client’s brand values by delivering attentive, personalised, and proactive service at every stage of the guest journey. From managing inquiries and reservations to coordinating payments, maintenance, and guest communications, this role is central to ensuring guest satisfaction and operational excellence. If you are detail-driven, guest-focused, and thrive in a dynamic hospitality environment, this is an excellent opportunity to contribute meaningfully to our team.





Key Responsibilities



Provide prompt, courteous, and informative responses to guest inquiries via phone,
, software platforms, and in person.

Manage reservations efficiently, confirm details, process payments, and handle special requests while encouraging direct bookings.

Process guest payments and monitor upcoming bookings to ensure all reservations are fully paid before arrival.

Log and manage maintenance requests, liaising with internal staff, external contractors, owners, and guests to ensure timely resolution.

Act as the primary point of contact for guest issues and disputes, coordinating with cleaning and maintenance teams and managing post-stay damage claims through appropriate channels.

Communicate reservation changes with the cleaning department, particularly for last-minute bookings or altered check-in/check-out times.

Collect, log, and share guest feedback to support continuous improvement of guest experiences.

Follow the Triage Communication Procedure to ensure professional and effective communication with clients, staff, and stakeholders.

Support the team by completing ad-hoc tasks and responsibilities as required by management.



Other Responsibilities



Make necessary process suggestions and improvements which can help the team.

Contributes to team effort by accomplishing related results as needed.

Perform other related tasks and duties that may be assigned by the client later on.



About You



Minimum of 3 years’ experience in guest reservations, short-term rentals, property management, or a related hospitality role.

Guest-Focused: Warm, empathetic, and professional in all interactions, with a passion for delivering exceptional service.

Skilled Communicator: Strong interpersonal and communication skills across phone,
, software, and in-person channels.

Detail-Oriented: Accurate in managing reservations, payments, and service requests.

Problem-Solver: Proactive in resolving guest issues, finding fair solutions, and maintaining positive relationships.

Hospitality Experience: Previous experience in customer service or hospitality, demonstrating professionalism and commitment to guest satisfaction.

Tech-Savvy: Proficient with booking management platforms such as Airbnb, 
, and direct booking systems; experience with Guesty, Breezeway, Suite-Op, Google Suite, Notion, and Slack is highly regarded.

Flexible & Proactive: Willing to take on additional responsibilities, learn new skills, and grow with the company.

Preferred (Not Essential): Familiarity with bookkeeping and payroll.



Finer Details



Schedule: TBD

Start Date: TBD

*Experience with remote team tools like Time Doctor, Slack, Trello, Google Suite, LastPass,
 and Zoom

*Excellent English skills, and able to communicate well both verbally and in writing

*Proven expertise in editing short-form TikTok content, with advanced proficiency in CapCut. (not YouTube-style long-form)

*Strong understanding of:

**TikTok pacing and hooks

**Product-driven storytelling

**TikTok Shop style content

*Ability to edit:

**Talking-head videos

**Product demos

**Lifestyle shots

**Voiceover videos

*Strong eye for:

**Timing

**Visual flow

**Brand presentation

*Content that converts sales and retains viewers

*Comfortable working in a high-volume, fast-paced environment

*Open to learning and using AI tools to improve efficiency

*Excellent organization and file management



TECH REQUIREMENTS:

*Computer - at least i7 or equivalent with 16gb RAM

*Internet Speed - At least 100 MBPS Download speed



Job Type: Part-Time (potentially move into full-time depending on business needs and performance ) - 4 hours daily / 20 hours weekly

Schedule: 3PM-7PM EST M-F // 4AM-8AM PHT

Salary Range: PHP 30,000- PHP 40,000 monthly, Depending on experience
