title: Operational Efficiency Consultant
description:
| ARE YOU THE DIAMOND WE ARE LOOKING FOR? |



Operational Efficiency Consultant 

Amazing role with high level benefits | Immediate ASAP start



Are you bored with roles that only want you to follow instructions?



Do you know that if you were in the right role, one where your logic, attention to detail, problem solving ability, and system thinking could truly shine, you would thrive?



Do you naturally see gaps, risks, inefficiencies, or things that do not quite add up and feel compelled to fix them?



If this sounds like you, welcome. You might just be our person.

Welcome to your Ultimate career move.



| ABOUT THE ROLE |



We are hiring for one role and looking for a diamond. You are rare, and so are we.



This Operational Efficiency Consultant will join our long term and well established Filipino team at My Ultimate Events, Australia’s leading events company for hens, bucks, and corporate team celebrations.



This is not a basic admin role. This is not a robotic process role.



This is a thinking role!



You will work directly with our Business Delivery Manager and play a critical role in ensuring events, systems, and processes genuinely work in the real world.



Your focus is operational readiness, problem prevention, system improvement, and intelligent support across event delivery, client experience, and internal performance.



You will review confirmed events, pressure test bookings, identify risks before they become issues, and apply logic to ensure everything is set up to run smoothly for clients and suppliers on the day or night of the event.



You will also support feedback management, client communication, supplier negotiation, and operational problem solving. This requires judgement, intuition, and commercial awareness, not scripts.



There are administrative tasks involved, but they are never mindless. Everything you do has context, logic, and impact.



This role sits at the intersection of structure and thinking.

Process matters. Accuracy matters. Logic matters.



We are not filling a seat. We are looking for someone who enjoys complexity, thinks deeply, and takes pride in making systems and outcomes better.



| CORE RESPONSIBILITIES |



-Review confirmed events to ensure they are operationally sound and genuinely ready to run

-Review the full booking journey to identify risks, gaps, timing issues, or logical inconsistencies

-Apply problem solving to ensure events will work for clients, suppliers, and the business

-Identify root causes of issues rather than treating symptoms

-Work with the Business Delivery Manager to improve systems, workflows, and operational efficiency

-Manage client feedback with professionalism, empathy, and commercial logic

-Liaise with suppliers to understand constraints, options, and realistic solutions

-Ensure clients feel heard while protecting business policy and system integrity

-Answer inbound phone calls from existing clients and think clearly in live situations

-Support performance and process oversight by identifying where processes are not being followed or where processes themselves need improvement

-Step in during peak periods or team absences to support CRM admin, client support, confirmations, and operational tasks

-Maintain high standards of accuracy, organisation, and follow through at all times



This role requires judgement, not box ticking.



| WHO YOU ARE |



-Highly logical and analytical by nature

-Exceptionally organised with strong attention to detail

-Someone who enjoys solving problems and improving how things work

-Calm and clear thinking under pressure

-Emotionally intelligent and commercially aware

-Comfortable making judgement calls within defined frameworks

-Confident working independently while collaborating closely with leadership

-Intellectually curious and motivated to understand the why behind systems and decisions



If you only like following instructions without thinking, this role is not for you.

If you dislike structure and accountability, this role is also not for you.



We are looking for someone who can do both.



| YOU MUST HAVE |



-Previous experience in operations, admin, client support, coordination, or similar roles that required judgement and problem solving

-Strong written English with excellent attention to detail across spelling, tone, and logic

-Experience using CRM systems and working within structured processes

-Confidence speaking with clients by phone when required

-Strong time management skills and the ability to prioritise under pressure

-Experience using Microsoft Teams, Outlook, Word, OneDrive, and CRM systems

-A quiet home office, fast wired internet, and a Windows PC

-Previous offshore experience with an Australian, UK, or US based company is an advantage



| WORK HOURS |



Please only apply if you can consistently commit to these exact hours.



Hours

Monday to Friday

8:00am to 5:00pm Brisbane time

(6:00am to 3:00pm Manila time)



Breaks

Two paid 10 minute breaks per day

One unpaid 1 hour lunch break



These hours are essential to maintain operational rhythm with our Australian team.



| SALARY AND BENEFITS |



-50000 PHP Per Month + Bonuses + PTO

-13th month pay

-All Filipino public holidays fully paid and you do not work

-15 days paid annual leave

-Structured onboarding, training, and clear frameworks

-Ongoing mentorship and leadership support

-Long term, full time role with a trusted Australian company

-Amazing role with Genuine growth opportunity



| ABOUT US |



My Ultimate Events is Australia’s leading events organisation for hens, bucks, and corporate team events.



We have been creating unforgettable experiences for over 15 years and have proudly built a strong, loyal Filipino Australian team.



We value intelligence, reliability, clarity, and people who think. We expect high standards, but we also invest deeply in our team.



You will not be a freelancer or a temp. You will be a valued long term tea
mber!



| HOW TO APPLY |



Send your application directly to 



We do not check the OnlineJobs inbox.
 applications only.



Please include:



A short personalised video explaining why you are a strong fit for a thinking based operations role



A cover letter outlining your relevant experience and an example of when you solved a problem by thinking beyond a process. This must be written by you, not AI



Your CV



Confirmation of your PC specs, internet speed, and workspace setup



If you are logical, detail focused, adaptable, and ready for a long term role where thinking genuinely matters, we cannot wait to meet you.



| WELCOME TO YOUR ULTIMATE CAREER MOVE |

title: Full-Time SEO Specialist (Long-Term Role)
description:
# Digital Content, SEO & eCommerce Specialist (Full-Time, Long-Term)



**Company:** Imperi

**Location:** Remote (Full-Time)

**Employer:** U.S.-Based Company – San Antonio, Texas



---



## About Imperi



Imperi is a growing B2B distribution company supplying restaurants, hotels, caterers, and commercial businesses across Texas with foodservice and janitorial supplies.



We are modernizing our digital operations and expanding online ordering. Our website plays a critical role in customer acquisition, product discovery, and ongoing growth.



We are hiring a full-time tea
mber to support **SEO growth, website content management, and product catalog operations**.



---



## Role Overview



This position combines **SEO execution**, **website content management**, and **product catalog updates**.



Initially, SEO initiatives will be a major focus. Over time, the role will transition toward ongoing website improvement, product onboarding, and maintaining high-quality digital content across our eCommerce platform.



This is a long-term position intended for someone who wants stable employment and career growth with a U.S. company.



---



## Key Responsibilities



### SEO & Website Optimization



* Keyword research and search opportunity analysis

* Optimize collection, product, and landing pages

* Improve internal linking and site structure

* Support Local SEO and Google Business Profile optimization

* Monitor rankings, traffic, and conversions

* Conduct technical SEO audits and track improvements



---



### Website Content Management



* Create and update website pages and landing pages

* Publish blog articles and SEO content

* Maintain consistent formatting and branding

* Update banners, promotional content, and page layouts

* Ensure website content accuracy and usability



---



### Product & Catalog Management



* Upload new products and maintain listings

* Optimize product titles, descriptions, and metadata

* Organize categories and collections

* Improve product discoverability and search relevance

* Maintain product data quality and consistency

* Perform ongoing product updates and corrections



---



## Platforms & Tools



Experience with some of the following preferred:



* Shopify or other eCommerce platforms

* Google Search Console

* Google Analytics (GA4)

* Ahrefs or SEMrush

* Excel / Google Sheets

* Screaming Frog

* Google Business Profile

* AI tools such as ChatGPT



---



## Requirements



* Experience with SEO and website content management

* eCommerce or product catalog experience preferred

* Excellent written English

* Strong attention to detail

* Organized and process-driven mindset

* Ability to follow structured workflows

* Full-time availability with reliable internet



---



## Work Schedule



* Full-Time (40 hours/week)

* Long-term role

* Partial overlap with U.S. business hours preferred



---



We are looking for someone who wants to grow with our company long-term.



---



## How to Apply



Please include:



1. Summary of your SEO and website management experience

2. Example websites or eCommerce stores you worked on

3. Experience managing products or catalog updates

4. Tools you regularly use

5. Expected monthly salary (USD)

title: Social Media Specialist
description:
**Social Media Star with Fast Computer Processor for Video – Part-Time (Boracchia Wiviott Wealth Partners & Other Ventures)**



Hi there,



I hope this message finds you well! We’re a fast-moving team based in California that also manages a non-profit and a real estate brokerage in addition to wealth management company. We’re looking for a **Social Media Star** who is not only passionate about creating engaging video content but also loves working across different brands with a strong attention to detail. This is a part-time position with potential for growth as we expand.



We need someone who thrives on producing high-quality, brand-consistent content, and is comfortable with fast-paced video editing for reels. You’ll be expected to follow our very specific brand guidelines, including using our **Canva account** to create stunning visuals that align with our various brands—real estate, non-profit, and wealth management. Attention to detail is key, especially when it comes to adhering to our brand colors, style guides, and overall aesthetic.



**What We Offer:**



- A dynamic, growing team that values collaboration and creativity. We love promoting from within, and if you excel in this role, we’ll help you grow.

- Pay is $2 per hour, with the opportunity for the role to evolve into a full-time position as we expand.

- A supportive team environment focused on continuous improvement, where teamwork and excellence are prioritized.

  

**What You’ll Be Doing:**



- **Video Creation & Editing:** Producing high-quality, engaging video content for our social media platforms. You’ll use your creativity to help us tell our brand stories across real estate, non-profit, and wealth management.

- **Social Media Management:** Managing our various social media accounts for all of our brands, posting consistent and engaging content, and following each brand’s social media strategy.

- **Brand Consistency:** Adhering strictly to our brand guidelines for each company, including the correct use of colors, fonts, and styles. This is essential to maintaining consistency across all of our brands.

- **Following Directives:** Collaborating with the team to understand our brands and executing content accordingly. You’ll be expected to create videos and posts that align perfectly with our vision for each brand.

- **Staying Up-to-Date with Trends:** Keeping up with the latest social media trends and using that knowledge to create fresh, exciting content that engages our audience.

- **Fast Response Times:** As part of a fast-paced team, we require rapid responses. We expect content turnaround within 24 hours, often quicker depending on urgency.

- **Tech-Savvy:** Comfortable using **Canva** (via our account) and other video editing software to create professional, polished content.

  

**Key Qualifications:**



- Strong written and spoken English.

- Previous experience in video creation, social media management, or related fields is preferred, but we’re open to candidates eager to learn.

- Tech-savvy and comfortable working with **Canva** and other social media tools.

- Extremely detail-oriented, with a keen eye for brand consistency.

- Ability to work independently and take initiative.

- Availability to work during flexible hours—expectation to be available on call from 8 pm to 8 am California hours or completing tasks during working hours (task-based pay only).



**Additional Information:**



- This role starts part-time, with the potential to transition into a full-time position as we grow.

- We value clear communication, initiative, and a positive, can-do attitude.

- Pay for this position is $2 per hour.



**To Apply:**



Please send your resume, a brief cover letter explaining why you're the perfect fit for this role, and a portfolio or examples of past social media work (especially video content). We look forward to seeing how you can elevate our brand!



*We hire quickly and encourage serious applicants only for this reason.*



Best regards,  

Lea Wiviott Boracchia  

Boracchia Wiviott Wealth Partners, Wealth Partners Real Estate & Imagine Equality

title: Welcome to K-POP Universe: Office Admin Role (Entry-Level) for E-Commerce – Join the Beat !
description:

- A PH VA team of more than 5 people has already been formed, and business collaboration is possible using Tagalog in a comfortable atmosphere.

- Providing educational tutorial videos and operating a mentorship program to help new comers quickly adapt



[About Us]

* Company Introduction (Video):

youtu.be/dO2mWWZANx8



[Join Summitree and Write Your K-POP Legacy Alongside Filipinos]

Summitree envisions leveraging their Filipino employees' intelligence and English fluency to expand globally while sharing their passion for K-POP. They highlight the Philippines' crucial role in their expansion plans, emphasizing collaboration with their Filipino team to make a mark in the K-POP world. Joining Summitree means joining a multicultural team (Korea, Philippines, Mongolia, Others) with a shared goal of making K-POP history.



[Responsibilities]

We are looking for a “Full-Time” Office Admin to handle our business.

You will be doing a variety of tasks, almost all of which we will create tutorials for you.

1. Order fulfillment and shipping label generation

You will be responsible for gathering and processing customer orders accurately and efficiently. This includes coordinating with third-party logistics (3PL) providers for inbound and outbound shipments to ensure smooth operations.

2. Product listing and scheduling

As a distributor of K-POP records and merchandise, you will be involved in registering new products into our system. This includes managing inventory, updating product information, and ensuring accurate data entry. Additionally, you will be responsible for scheduling release dates and managing timelines using tools like Google Calendar.

3. Customer service support

providing excellent customer service is crucial to us. You will be responsible for addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction. Your communication skills and problem-solving abilities will play a vital role in maintaining strong relationships with our valued customers.



[Required qualifications & skillset (must have)]

* Excellent written and verbal English communication skills

* Experience in puchasing K-POP Album or knowledge of K-POP related products (album, merchandise)

* Idea of how to promote K-POP albums and gain traffics in our shopping mall in PH online K-POP community for each artists



[Desired qualifications & skillset (nice to have)]

* Experience in handling customer service

* Experience in Photoshop

* Experience in
 Ads or Google Ads

* Knowledge and Experience of Microsoft Excel & Familar with Using Various Formula

* Experience in experience in Amazon Business (Familiar with Interface and function) or other E-commerce Platform



[Compensation & Employment Terms]

Position Classification:

This is an entry-level position. All candidates, regardless of prior experience, will undergo structured training under a designated mentor to adapt to our internal systems and operational standards.



• Payment Term: Monthly basis

• Probationary Period: 6 months

o Months 0–3: USD 280/month

o Months 4–6: USD 300/month, subject to satisfactory performance evaluation after the first 3 months

o The probation period may be shortened if you demonstrate fast work adaptation and receive an excellent evaluation. (This has occurred in multiple past cases.)



• After Probation Evaluation (Regularization): USD 300/month

o Performance & Total Compensation Structure:

Upon regularization, employees receive a guaranteed 13th Month Pay and at least one annual performance bonus equivalent to one month’s base salary during peak sales seasons. Additional bonuses may be granted based on company performance. When annualized, the total compensation is equivalent to approximately USD 350–380 per month.

o Continued employment and salary maintenance are subject to overall performance evaluation.

o If performance does not meet expectations, adjustments may be made in accordance with company standards.

• Additional Compensation:

o Performance-based incentives may be provided based on work attitude, responsibility, consistency, and overall contribution.



• After Regularization:

o Annual contract renewal is standard

- Salary adjustments may be made based on performance, teamwork, and overall evaluation.

o If overall performance—including work capability, teamwork, reliability, and internal evaluations—is considered outstanding, salary increases may be granted within a shorter period. (This has occurred in multiple past cases.)

o Exceptional performance may also lead to early promotions or salary increases prior to the annual review.



[Perks & Benefits]

1. Regular Employee Benefits

- 13th Month Salary provided

- 10 additional paid leave days upon regularization

2. Performance-Based Incentives

- Additional incentives may be provided during high-performance sales periods

(Example: major comeback seasons for artists such as BTS or Stray Kids)

3. Birthday Benefit (After 6 Months of Employment)

- Receive one free K-POP album of your favorite artist on your birthday

4. Paid Holidays (Regardless of Employment Status)

- January 1st (New Year’s Day) and Christmas Day are paid holidays

- Applies to both probationary and regular employees

5. Long Service Incentive Program

- 1 Year Service: PHP17,000

- 3 Year Service: PHP22,500

- 5 Year Service: PHP28,000



[How To Apply for the job]

Just Fill out 10 Simple Questions through Google Form






Interview via google meet will be conducted after first screening and candidates will be notifed to their
s or
 



Thank you



Human Resource Dept.

Summitree

title: Social Media Manager
description:
About Cleo+Coco

Cleo+Coco is next-level clean with high-performance deodorants and functional personal care — from deodorant balms, powders, and sprays. We have a growing presence across Instagram and TikTok and we want our social media to reflect the same quality, creativity, and authenticity we put into our products. We benchmark ourselves against brands like Salt & Stone, Nimbi, and Joan's Road Beauty.



The Role

We're looking for a talented and organised Social Media Manager to take ownership of our social calendar and community across Instagram and TikTok. This isn't just a scheduling role — we want someone who can build genuine community, generate high-quality UGC, drive engagement, and understand the nuances of platforms like WeChat and TYB. You'll be the voice of Cleo+Coco online.



You will need several contactable hours that overlap with New York City working hours (9 AM–6 PM ET).



What You'll Own

• Planning and managing the social media content calendar across Instagram and TikTok

• Community management — responding to comments, DMs, and building genuine relationships with our audience, including utilising WeChat as a messaging tool within Instagram to engage with our community

• Sourcing, coordinating, and quality-reviewing UGC (user-generated content) that meets our brand standards

• Managing our presence and community strategy on TYB (Try Your Best)

• Writing compelling captions, content briefs, and creator outreach messages in our brand voice

• Collaborating with our Video Editor and Animator to ensure assets are posted effectively and on-brand

• Tracking and reporting on content performance across all platforms — reach, engagement, saves, follower growth, link clicks

• Identifying trending content formats, sounds, and cultural moments relevant to natural personal care

• Supporting influencer and creator seeding programmes

• Maintaining a consistent, high-quality output that positions Cleo+Coco among leading clean beauty brands



What We're Looking For

• Proven experience managing social media for a consumer brand — beauty, wellness, or personal care experience strongly preferred

• Strong portfolio of social accounts you have grown or managed, with measurable results

• Experience managing or growing UGC programmes and working with creators

• Familiarity with TYB (Try Your Best) community platform and comfortable using WeChat as a messaging tool within 



Instagram for community engagement

• Strong eye for content quality — you know what looks premium and what doesn't

• Excellent written English and a natural, engaging brand voice

• Highly organised — comfortable managing a content calendar weeks in advance

• Analytical mindset — able to read performance data and adapt strategy accordingly

• Availability to overlap with NYC hours (9 AM–6 PM ET) for several hours per day



How to Apply

Please include in your application:

• Links to Instagram and TikTok accounts you have managed

• Key growth or engagement results achieved

• Examples of UGC campaigns or community initiatives you've led

• Your availability and preferred working hours

title: TikTok Shop Manager
description:
About Cleo+Coco

Cleo+Coco is next-level clean with high-performance deodorants and functional personal care — from deodorant balms, powders, and sprays. We're building toward the level of brands like Salt & Stone, Nimbi, and Joan's Road Beauty: clean, effective, beautifully crafted. Our TikTok Shop is a key growth channel and we're looking for someone to own it.

The Role



We're looking for an experienced, organised, and commercially-minded TikTok Shop Manager to take full ownership of our TikTok Shop — from strategy through to day-to-day operations. This is a hands-on role for someone who has done it before and can show results. You'll be responsible for driving revenue and brand awareness through the platform, managing our affiliate and creator ecosystem, and keeping the shop running smoothly.

You will need several contactable hours that overlap with New York City working hours (9 AM–6 PM ET).



What You'll Own

• Full management and optimisation of the Cleo+Coco TikTok Shop — product listings, pricing, promotions, and catalogue health

• Developing and executing our TikTok Shop strategy aligned with brand objectives and sales targets

• Building and managing a structured affiliate creator network — outreach, briefing, relationship management, and performance analysis

• Sourcing and coordinating UGC (user-generated content) aligned with our brand voice and product positioning

• Planning and managing Live Shopping sessions and shoppable video campaigns

• Monitoring and reporting on key metrics: GMV, conversion rate, affiliate performance, ROAS, and shop health

• Staying current with TikTok algorithm changes, trending formats, and emerging commerce features

• Ensuring compliance with TikTok Shop policies and best practices

• Collaborating with our team on campaign timing, product launches, and seasonal promotions

• Providing regular performance reports with actionable insights

What We're Looking For

• Proven experience managing a TikTok Shop for a consumer brand — ideally in beauty, personal care, or wellness

• Strong understanding of the US natural personal care market and clean beauty consumer

• Demonstrated track record of driving GMV growth and affiliate programme results — please share brands you've worked with and outcomes

• Excellent organisational skills: you can manage multiple workstreams without dropping the ball

• Data-driven decision maker who is equally comfortable with creative strategy

• Strong written English for creator briefing and communication

• Availability to overlap with NYC hours (9 AM–6 PM ET) for several hours per day

How to Apply

title: Web Developer/builder
description:
Job Description: Web Developer for E-Commerce & Dropshipping Websites

Job Type: Freelance / Contract

Location: Remote

Compensation: Based on experience and project scope



About the Role

We are looking for a skilled Web Developer to design and develop high-converting e-commerce websites for our dropshipping brands. The ideal candidate should have experience creating fast, mobile-optimized, and conversion-focused Shopify or WooCommerce stores. You will be responsible for designing product pages, integrating payment gateways, setting up apps/plugins, and ensuring smooth functionality.



Key Responsibilities

? Build and design e-commerce websites optimized for conversions and user experience.

 ? Develop product pages that showcase benefits, social proof, and compelling CTAs.

 ? Integrate payment gateways, upsell apps, tracking pixels, and automation tools.

 ? Ensure mobile responsiveness and site speed optimization.

 ? Implement SEO best practices to improve organic visibility.

 ? Troubleshoot and fix bugs, errors, and performance issues.

 ? Work with marketing teams to align the website with ad creatives and sales funnels.

 ? Provide ongoing website maintenance and updates as needed.



Requirements

???? Proven experience in developing Shopify, WooCommerce, or custom-coded e-commerce stores.

 ???? Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Liquid (for Shopify).

 ???? Experience with Shopify themes, page builders (GemPages, PageFly, Shogun), and WooCommerce plugins.

 ???? Understanding of CRO (Conversion Rate Optimization) to design high-performing product pages.

 ???? Ability to integrate third-party apps 
 marketing, reviews, upsells, tracking pixels, etc.).

 ???? Familiarity with SEO fundamentals and speed optimization techniques.

 ???? Experience with dropshipping platforms like CJ Dropshipping, Zendrop, or AliExpress integration.

 ???? Ability to create secure, high-speed, and scalable websites.

 ???? Strong attention to detail and ability to meet tight deadlines.

 ???? Portfolio of past e-commerce websites is required.



Preferred Skills (Bonus)

???? Experience with custom Shopify themes or headless e-commerce development.

 ???? Knowledge of AI-powered chatbots, automation tools, or custom scripts.

 ???? Familiarity with A/B testing tools like Google Optimize or VWO.

 ???? Understanding of Google Tag Manager,
 Pixel, and Conversion API setup.



Compensation

Rates will be discussed based on experience and project scope. Payment can be per project or on a retainer basis for ongoing work.



How to Apply

 Submit your portfolio, rate expectations, and past e-commerce store samples.

 Tell us why you're the best fit for this role!

title: Full Time Video Editor / Web Designer
description: Need an editor who can do 45 videos for FB ads every week. That's 180 Videos per month. Each video is 30 to 60 secs. We will train you how we want the videos to be edited.

title: n8n + Supabase + Lovable Automation Expert
description:
Seeking expert-level n8n specialist (3+ yrs) for complex, scalable automations with Lovable/Base44 and Supabase backends. No juniors, no "learning n8n".



Requirements:

-3+ years building advanced n8n workflows: multi-branch logic, error handling, custom JS/TS code nodes, heavy API orchestration, webhooks, looping, scheduling, AI nodes.



-Proven n8n + Lovable/Base44 integrations: AI-driven code tools, frameworks for automation/backend, custom integrations. Must show real examples. (Zapier/Windmill experience a plus, but n8n core.)



-Strong PostgreSQL/SQL: complex queries (JOINs, CTEs, window functions), optimization, schema design.



-Hands-on Supabase experience: auth (RLS, JWT), tables/schemas, Edge Functions, Realtime, Storage, full backend APIs + n8n webhooks.



-JavaScript/TypeScript proficiency for custom nodes/functions.



Strong Plus: Agency/SaaS automations, Make/Zapier fallback, Stripe/Whop/Airtable, basic frontend (Tailwind/Next.js).

Apply ONLY if you meet ALL above and send a demo – others ignored. Only applicants who provide demos will be considered.



: 

Subject: n8n Automation - [Your Name]



Include:

1. Resume/portfolio.

2. GitHub profile link (pinned repos with relevant n8n/custom code strongly preferred).

3. 2-3 specific examples: n8n + Lovable/Base44 workflow JSON/screenshots/Loom video (complex ones only). Send as demo attachments/links.

4. Brief: One complex n8n + Lovable/Base44 workflow you built (describe outcome, explain the process simply so a non-technical person can follow). 



Serious experts only. If you routinely solve "impossible" integrations, apply now.

title: Experienced Direct Response Copywriter ($2,000 – $4,000 Per Month)
description:
Work Hours: Full-time, Monday to Friday, normal Philippine working hours



Young Publisher | 
/



We’re an international digital publishing company hiring from the Philippines for over 5 years.

We have 50+ tea
mbers worldwide and 200+ verified reviews with a 4.9 average rating.

We build long-term partnerships, not short-term gigs.

We don't disappear, we pay on time



We’re looking for an experienced direct response copywriter who can:

- Take full ownership of performance-driven campaigns

- Write
s that get opened, read, and clicked

- Create Ads that stop people from scrolling.

- Craft persuasive copy that drives readers to act.



This is a full-time remote role with clear growth opportunities. You’ll start with
s and ads, and as you prove yourself, move into sales pages and VSLs.



What you’ll do



- Write broadcast
s and automated sequences

- Create Meta ad copy and video scripts

- Help produce ebooks and lead magnets using AI tools

- Progress into sales pages and VSL scripts for launches



Why is this role different?



- You’ll receive direct feedback from an 8-figure copywriter. This is a serious opportunity to sharpen your skills fast.

- You’ll also get access to premium courses and AI communities. We invest in our team because we want long-term growth.

- We encourage AI tools — but only with strong critical thinking. This is not a beginner role.



Essentials



- Full-time, Monday to Friday, Philippine standard working hours

- Long-term position with growth into sales pages and VSLs

- $2,000–$4,000 USD per month, depending on experience

- Fully remote

- Reliable, on-time payments every two weeks via Wise



Requirements



- At least 2 years of direct response copywriting experience (not blog or content writing)

- Proven results: open rates, CTR, conversions, ROAS

- Experience writing for coaches, course creators, or info product businesses

- Native-level English for US, UK, or Australian audiences

- Strong understanding of hooks, emotional triggers, objection handling, and CTAs

- Experience with Meta ad copy and video scripts

- Ability to adapt to different brand voices

- Comfortable using AI tools with critical thinking

- Strong communication skills and independence

- Reliable, responsive, proactive, and coachable



Hiring process



#1: Paid test task

#2: Interview

#3: Paid test month at 50% salary



We’re looking for professionals who know their craft and want long-term growth.



How to apply



Apply via our Typeform here: 
/to/CZb9go1y



Note: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.



Young Publisher



P.S. Young Publisher is the recruitment company. Successful candidates will work under Social Influence Consulting LLC.

title: CONTENT RESEARCH EXPERT (CRE): $800 a month
description:
BENEFITS



- Full-time position: 7.5 hours/day

- Schedule: Monday to Friday, flexible time

- Salary: $800 a month

- Paid every two weeks via Wise. (direct to your bank account, almost no fees, no waiting for payday!)

- Full work-from-home flexibility

- A young, supportive team that values your output without micromanagement

- Clear growth path with opportunities to expand your role

- Join our international team working with established content creators and brands

- Work with the latest AI tools and social media platforms



TASKS



TASK #1: Research and Curate Viral Content



- Research 30-50 viral short-form videos on Instagram Reels and TikTok

- Strategically select content ideas that will help specific clients go viral

- Organize all content ideas in the "Client Master Sheet"

- Copy/paste links to each content piece

- Write out the hook of each content piece

- Categorize content (Hero Story, Educational, Entertaining, Promotional)

- Add precise video instructions on how each piece can be replicated



TASK #2: Provide Strategic Content Direction



- Analyze client information (niche, target audience, personality, content style)

- Identify and recommend 3 inspirational accounts for clients to follow in their niche

- Create detailed instructions for content replication tailored to the client's abilities

- Think strategically about what will help each client succeed



TASK #3: Administrative Responsibilities



- Maintain a content library categorized by niche for efficient future use

- Complete daily End-of-Day Reports (EOD)

- Attend multiple meetings with your manager each week

- Continuously improve content recommendations based on what works



REQUIREMENTS



- Excellent English skills (C1 or above - non-negotiable!)

- Previous experience in content creation is a MUST

- Experience in content research and trend analysis

- Strong understanding of what makes content go viral

- Knowledge of Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts features

- Strategic thinking and attention to detail

- Ability to provide clear, actionable instructions

- Reliable internet connection and professional home office setup

- 100% say-do ratio and commitment to deadlines



HOW TO APPLY



ROUND 1: Complete our application form and record a personal introduction:



Fill out the form: 
/to/QRoz4WLV



Note: Put "CRE" + [Your Name & Family Name] in the "Name" field in the form.



Record a 3-minute Loom video introducing yourself (instructions in form)



Important: Please provide genuine, personal responses (no AI-written answers). We want to get to know YOU!



ROUND 2: Qualified candidates will be invited for an interview.



MORE ABOUT US



We've been in the industry since 2019 and have worked with over 3000 clients. We currently receive around 80-100 new clients per month. We provide an "80% done-for-you content & monetization system" that helps creators go viral and turn views into income using short-form content, AI, and proven strategies.



MORE ABOUT US



- About Young Publisher:

title: Upwork Lead Generation & Project Assistant (Long-term / Hourly + Commission)
description:
I am a university student in Japan (majoring in Science/AI). 

I have the technical foundation to build AI automation and workflows, but I have one fatal weakness: 

I am not good at sales, and I hate cold outreach.



I am trying to build a long-term freelance agency (Guild), and I am looking for a reliable right-hand partner. I am not looking for a one-off gig worker. I want someone who wants to build a long-term career and eventually take over the day-to-day operations of the agency.



Master Plan (Year 1 and Beyond):



Year 1 (Co-op Mode):

You will be the "Frontman". Find clients on Upwork or LinkedIn who need help with AI and automation. 

I will pay a guaranteed fixed hourly rate for all the time you spend researching, sending proposals, and doing outreach. 

When you get a client, I step in. I build the technical solution, you handle the client communication in English, and we deliver it together. We will then share the commission/bonus from the project.



Year 2+ (Your Agency):

Next year, I will transition to a corporate role in Japan and step back from day-to-day operations. 

My goal is for YOU to manage the knowledge, client relationships, and systems we built in Year 1. Ultimately, you will run this agency.



What I offer:

* Financial Security & Upside: A stable hourly rate for your outreach work, plus a high commission rate when we close deals. 

* Honest Partnership: I won't pretend to be a Silicon Valley billionaire. I am a student trying to build something real. Let's learn, fail, and succeed together.

* A Long-term Home: I want the skills and templates you develop to be the foundation of our long-term business.



Requirements:

* Excellent English reading, writing, and speaking skills.

* Thick skin: You must be okay with being ignored or rejected on Upwork.

* Interest in AI/Automation (You don't need to be an engineer, but you must be willing to learn the concepts).

* Looking for a stable, long-term relationship (1+ years).



How to Apply (PLEASE READ CAREFULLY):

Do NOT just send a generic application. I want to understand how you think. 

To apply, please send a message through OnlineJobs.ph and include the following:

1. Put the word "GUILD" at the very top of your message.

2. Answer this: What is your past experience with Upwork, BPO, or Lead Generation?

3. Answer this: Why are you interested in this "Apprentice to Agency Owner" transition plan?



(Generic applications without the word "GUILD" and the answers will be ignored.)

description:
You are organized

You can manage up

You use AI every day

Probolsky Research is a market and opinion research firm that serves public agencies and private-sector clients across the United States. We run a fast-moving business that depends on strong execution, clear thinking, and repeatable workflows. This role is a force multiplier to scale the team's output.



You will build our business operating system. You'll design AI-powered trackers and automated project stacks that replace manual work with AI-infused, consistent workflows.



You will produce morning action plans, evening wrap ups, weekly “what we shipped” summaries, and forward thinking reports on future work



Required



You are not shy

Experience building business operations processes

Willingness to correct leadership when they are wrong

Exceptional spoken and written English skills

Can turn messy inputs into amazing work product

Have AI fluency in practice, including prompt creation, and a willingness to learn about and experiment with AI agents and automations

Comfort working directly with an executive in a rapid, iterative working style

Comfort working Pacific Time hours



Preferred: Experience in professional services (law, consulting, research, or creative agencies) where the deliverable is knowledge work



Compensation and benefits



45,000–65,000 per month to start, full-time

Quarterly self-performance reviews provide a clear path to promotions

Paid time off

Health coverage support (PhilHealth or HMO)

13th month



Apply

Use this subject line in your
: “CoS”

title: Outbound Enrollment Closer – Career Certification Training1 (Remote, EST)
description:
Outbound Enrollment Closer – Career Certification Programs (Remote, EST)



This is not customer service.

This is not inbound order-taking.



This is a phone-driven, outbound enrollment closer role for professionals who know how to control a consult, qualify fast, overcome objections, and close.



We are a U.S.-based online career school enrolling students into IT and Project Management certification programs (CompTIA, PMP, and related tracks). We provide warm leads. You bring the discipline, urgency, and closing skill.



What You’ll Be Doing (Daily Reality)



Make high-volume outbound calls to prospective students



Run structured, consultative enrollment calls (needs analysis ? recommendation ? close)



Control the call, set next steps, and ask for the enrollment



Handle objections around price, time, confidence, and urgency



Follow up relentlessly until the prospect converts or disqualifies



Log activity and outcomes accurately in CRM



Hit daily activity targets and monthly enrollment goals



Improve close rates through coaching, scripts, and call reviews



If you don’t like calling, this role will break you.



Who This Role Is For



Proven outbound / inside sales closers



Comfortable dialing daily and living on the phone



Strong command of English with clear U.S. cultural fluency



Confident asking direct questions and pushing for decisions



Competitive, coachable, metrics-driven



Organized and accountable without supervision



Experience selling education, training, coaching, or professional services is a major plus



Familiarity with certifications (CompTIA, PMP) helps—but closing ability matters more



Bachelor’s degree required



Who Should NOT Apply



Anyone who needs inbound-only leads



Anyone uncomfortable asking for money



Anyone who avoids objection handling



Anyone who wants a “soft” admissions role



Anyone who disappears when targets tighten



Schedule



Monday–Friday



10:00 AM – 6:30 PM EST



Compensation



Base pay: $1,200–$1,600 USD per month



Performance-based advancement and leadership path



Long-term role with stability and growth for performers



(Top performers move fast. Average performers don’t last.)



What You Get



Warm leads with real intent



Clear scripts, frameworks, and coaching



No gimmicks, no fake promises—just real programs that work



A sales culture that rewards results



Bottom Line



If you can:



Control a sales conversation



Build urgency without lying



Close consistently



Take coaching and improve



You will win here.



If not—this role will expose you quickly.

APPLY TODAY! 



PTO, monthly allowances and paid holidays included in the pay package!

We specialize in organizing a wide range of events, from corporate conferences to social gatherings and everything in between. Our commitment to excellence and innovation sets us apart, and we're seeking a talented Multimedia Artist to help us build the best team possible.

- Edit and produce videos (short-form content, reels, ads, basic animations)

title: We're Hiring: Discord DM Setter — xTrades
description:
About Us

xTrades is a social trading platform. We help people learn how to trade and copy the trades of experienced traders. Our community is growing fast, and we need someone to connect with new members.



The Role

You will be the first person our leads talk to. When someone joins xTrades, you reach out to them on 
. You welcome them, walk them through what we offer, and book them on a free 15-minute onboarding call with our team.

You are not closing sales. You are opening doors. Your job is to start the conversation, build trust, and get people excited to learn more.



What You'll Do

You will send direct messages to new leads on 
 every day. You will guide them through the xTrades platform and answer basic questions about how copy trading works. You will book calls between leads and our closers. You will follow up with people who haven't responded. You will track your outreach and report your numbers.



What We're Looking For

You write in strong, clear English. Your grammar is solid and your tone is friendly. You have a basic understanding of the stock market and investing. You don't need to be an expert, but you should know the basics. You are comfortable sending a high volume of messages each day. You are organized and reliable. You show up and do the work.



Nice to Have

Experience with 
 communities. Background in sales, lead generation, or appointment setting. Interest in trading or financial markets. Familiarity with social or copy trading platforms.



How to Apply

Send us a message with a short intro about yourself. Tell us why this role fits you. Include a sample DM you would send to a new lead who just joined xTrades.

title: Customer Support Dropshipping
description:
Dear applicant,



We run a dropshipping business with a store in France.



We are looking for long-term employees to join our team. There is a great deal of growth opportunity for those that consistently make a positive contribution to our company. We are seeking great candidates that will represent the company with great customer service and dedication.



Therefore, please apply the word strawberry before you introduce yourself. Read on to find out what tasks we expect you to perform, as well as the experience we feel is necessary for this job.



This is a Customer Support job where you would have to follow a very clear process to keep our customers happy, but which will become very simple when you understand every step.



MUST HAVE KNOWLEDGE OF THESE PLATFORMS:



Re-Amaze / G Suite (help desk CRM)

Shopify (eCommerce platform)

Slack (communication channel)

ChatGPT (for prompts + translations)

DeepL (for translation)



Responsibilities:



Handling customer complaints.

Reporting on refunds/complaints.

Responding to customer
s regarding refunds, tracking numbers, FAQs.

Contributing to our documentation and improving our support processes.

Respond to all customer inquiries in a timely, polite and accurate manner.

Skilled in reporting into google sheets.

Demonstrate a high level of professionalism at all times.



We maintain an ETA of 24 hours so you must reply to the
s within this timeframe.



We will provide you with:



Video training

SOP’s to follow

 templates

Worksheets

Access to the team lead to answer all your questions.



Applicant needs to:



Speak fluent English both written and verbally

Minimum 2 years of experience in Ecommerce Customer Support

Be available for and open to team calls 

Must be organized, motivated, and willing to learn and grow.

title: Sales Outreach Executive
description:
Job Description



We are looking for a highly motivated and innovative Sales Outreach Executive to join our dynamic and process-driven sales and marketing organization. This is a high-impact role within a close-knit team, offering significant career growth, competitive compensation, and an attractive commission structure.



If you are fluent in English, confident in sales communication, and enjoy creating content while engaging with potential clients, this opportunity is designed for you. This is a fully remote position with a flexible work schedule and strong earning potential.



Role Overview



As a Brand Account Executive, you will play a critical role in generating new business for our Amazon Agency. Your primary focus will be proactive outreach, relationship-building, and booking qualified sales appointments. You will create personalized audit and tutorial videos (via Vidyard/Loom) to engage prospects and drive conversions. 



This role requires strong initiative, the ability to work independently, and confidence in cold outreach and sales conversations.



Key Responsibilities



• Conduct daily outreach, including recording 15+ personalized Loom/Vidyard videos per day

• Send a minimum of 12 videos per day (60 per week)

• Book at least 1 qualified meeting per week

• Make 14–18 follow-up calls daily

• Cold call prospects and confidently pitch services (once fully trained)

• Set appointments and manage
 communications to schedule calls with Sales Managers

• Maintain accurate CRM records and continuously develop lead pipelines

• Submit a daily performance report to your assigned manager/supervisor

• Monitor Slack channels (especially Sales channels) for updates and collaboration

• Attend weekly BDR team sync meetings

• Participate in regular one-on-one meetings with the BDR Team Lead

• Contribute toward a target of 5–8 signed clients per month

• Support the broader tam goal of 8 signed full-service contracts per month



Qualifications



• Fluent in English with excellent verbal and written communication skills

• Coachable and open to feedback

• Comfortable producing 10–30 sales outreach videos daily

• Confident in cold calling and independently pitching services

• Highly organized with strong CRM management and follow-up discipline

• Results-driven with a strong desire to close deals

• Comfortable working in a fast-paced, performance-based environment



Compensation & Benefits



• Competitive base plus High Commission

• Fast payout model – commissions are paid in full the same day the client pays

• Significant earning potential (six-figure income achievable for high performers)

• Fully remote position with schedule flexibility

• Strong career growth within a rapidly expanding Amazon agency



If you are performance oriented, thrive in sales environments, and are ready to take ownership of your earning potential, we encourage you to apply.

title: ???? PART-TIME WEBSITE IMPLEMENTATION & TEMPLATE DESIGNER
description:
About the Role



C+J Creative Services is a digital marketing and business development agency that helps schools, nonprofits, and service-based businesses grow online.



We are building a scalable website department and are looking for a Website Implementation & Template Designer who can refine, build, and elevate websites to meet strong UX and conversion standards.

You will collaborate with our fulfillment partner to review, refine, and elevate website builds while also creating reusable templates that allow us to scale efficiently.



This is a long-term opportunity with the potential to grow into a full-time Creative Lead role overseeing additional designers.

________________________________________

----Your Core Responsibilities----



Website Review & Refinement

• Collaborate with our fulfillment partner to review and elevate website builds

• Improve layout, spacing, mobile responsiveness, and visual hierarchy

• Ensure pages align with our internal UX and conversion standards

• Perform quality assurance before launch

• Handle revision cycles end-to-end



Page & Template Building

• Build full website pages from structured templates when needed

• Create reusable Elementor and Divi templates

• Build landing pages such as opt-in pages, VSL pages, and offer pages

• Duplicate and restructure high-performing layouts into scalable systems

• Embed forms, tracking codes, and integrations properly



Website Support & Maintenance

• Handle website support requests and content updates

• Make minor structural improvements when necessary

• Escalate deeper technical issues to our fulfillment partner

• Track updates inside our project management system

________________________________________

----What We’re Looking For----



Required:

• Strong experience with WordPress

• Proficiency in Elementor and Divi

• Solid understanding of user experience and layout principles

• Ability to build full pages from templates without hand-holding

• Ability to identify when a layout “feels off” and fix it

• Comfortable using AI tools to improve content and structure

• Strong English reading and writing

• Attention to detail

• Reliable internet connection



Preferred (but not required):

• Basic WooCommerce familiarity

• Experience building landing pages or funnels

• Experience working with marketing agencies

________________________________________

----How You’ll Work----



• You will work primarily in the background

• Leadership handles strategy and sales

• You own implementation quality and execution

• You collaborate with our fulfillment partner when needed

• You ensure nothing moves forward without meeting quality standards

________________________________________

----Daily Report Requirement----



Every workday, submit a short update answering:

1. What did you complete today?

2. What challenges or blockers did you face?

3. What do you need help with?

We value clarity, accountability, and consistent communication.

________________________________________

----Growth Path----



This role is designed to grow into:

• Full-Time Website Implementation Manager

• Template Systems Lead

• Creative Operations Manager

• Creative Lead overseeing additional designers

We are building a long-term creative department, not hiring short-term freelancers.

________________________________________

----Compensation----

• $600-$750 per month

• 15–25 hours per week

• First 2 months paid twice per month, then transition to monthly

• Flexible schedule (deadlines matter more than fixed hours)

• Long-term growth opportunity

________________________________________

----How to Apply----



Follow instructions carefully. Applications that do not follow instructions will be ignored.

1.
 your application with the subject line:

"Website Implementation Application – [Your Name]"

2. In the body of the
, include:

• A short introduction about yourself

• Links to 3–5 websites you personally worked on

• Confirmation that you are proficient in Elementor and Divi

• Confirmation that you can work 15–25 hours per week

• Your monthly salary expectation

3. Use 7 Apply Points to apply to this job.

4. At the end of your
, type the phrase:

“I read the full job description and I can follow instructions.”

title: SEO Specialist - Technical and Strategic Execution
description:

Job Role: Senior SEO Specialist Needed – Technical + Strategic Execution (Ongoing)



Company: Business CFO for Hire



Work Hours and Schedule: Flexible with some EST overlap



Work Duration: Part-time but long term

Commission Based only? [Yes/No]: No



Where/How to send application?: 



Description/Information:

We are looking for an experienced SEO professional to own and execute a structured monthly SEO program.

This is not a task-based backlink role.

 We want someone who understands search strategy, technical SEO, and sustainable organic growth.



Scope Overview

Monthly campaign structure includes:



• ~40 priority keywords



• 5 core landing pages



• Full technical audit and implementation



• On-page optimization



• Strategic link acquisition



• Monthly performance reporting



This is a long-term engagement for the right person.

• 5+ years proven SEO experience

We are looking for a strategic partner, not a volume executor.

If you take pride in disciplined, long-term SEO work, we’d like to talk.

title: Webflow Developer – Design-Minded & Motion-Aware
description:
JOB TITLE: Webflow Developer – Design-Minded & Motion-Aware

TYPE OF EMPLOYMENT: Full-Time

JOB DESCRIPTION:

We are a creative agency looking for a Webflow Developer who is not just a coder — you need to have a genuine eye for design. We have had developers before who could build things technically but had no sense of layout, visual hierarchy, or aesthetic. That is not what we are looking for. If you cannot look at a design and immediately understand the vision, this is not the role for you.

You will be working directly with our creative director to bring Figma and Illustrator designs to life on Webflow. You need to be able to take a desktop layout and translate it perfectly to mobile with proper responsive breakpoints, collapsible navigation, dropdown menus, and mobile-optimized interactions — not just shrink the desktop version and call it done.

This is a long-term role with a growing agency. If you are the right person, there is consistent work and room to grow with us.

Responsibilities:



Build and maintain Webflow websites from Figma or static design files

Develop fully responsive layouts across desktop, tablet, and mobile breakpoints

Implement animations, scroll interactions, hover effects, and motion design within Webflow

Build dropdown navigation, collapsible menus, and interactive UI components

Ensure pixel-perfect translation from design to live site

Collaborate closely with the creative director — you will be expected to understand the vision, not just execute instructions blindly

Maintain clean, organized class structures and CMS collections



Requirements:



Expert-level Webflow — this is non-negotiable. Do not apply if Webflow is not your primary tool

Strong understanding of HTML and CSS — you need to know what is happening under the hood

Proven ability to build responsive, mobile-first layouts with proper breakpoint management

Experience with Webflow interactions and animations (scroll-triggered, hover, entrance animations, etc.)

A strong portfolio that shows design sensibility — we want to see sites that look good, not just function

Ability to read and work from Figma files

Understanding of visual hierarchy, spacing, typography, and layout — you do not need to be a graphic designer but you need to think like one

Reliable internet connection and a capable computer setup

Strong communicator — you need to be able to ask the right questions and flag issues proactively



What will get you rejected immediately:



A portfolio full of generic, template-looking sites

No demonstrated understanding of responsive design

Applying without a portfolio

Saying you know Webflow but your work looks like it was built on a free website builder



If this is you please
 me at 
 or on WhatsApp at 
WAGE/SALARY: $6–$10/hour

DESIRED HOURS PER WEEK: 35

SKILLS: Webflow, Figma, HTML, CSS



?? Please read before applying:

I am looking for a Webflow Developer only. I am not looking for a Virtual Assistant, WordPress developer, or general IT person. If Webflow is not something you use regularly and confidently, do not apply. I will not respond to applications without a portfolio. Generic messages will be ignored.

title: Quantitative Research Consultant
description:
About the Role



We’re looking for a Quantitative Research Consultant who loves working with data and sees analysis as both a science and a creative process. You’ll play a key role in transforming raw data into clear, actionable insights that help clients make confident, strategic decisions.



This role is ideal for someone who enjoys spotting patterns, uncovering trends, and turning numbers into stories that actually mean something to stakeholders.



Working in a fast-paced, client-focused environment, you’ll contribute to the quantitative side of research projects from design through to insight and recommendation.



Key Responsibilities



Support survey design and questionnaire scripting

Clean, process, and analyse quantitative data

Produce data tables and outputs using research software

Conduct statistical analysis to identify insights, trends, and patterns

Translate quantitative findings into clear, actionable insights

Prepare accurate, client-ready reports and presentations

Integrate quantitative findings with qualitative insights when required

Analyse research data to develop strategic recommendations for clients



Qualifications & Experience

Tertiary qualification in a related field

(e.g. Statistics, Economics, Business, Marketing, Data Analytics)

At least 1 year of experience in market research or a data-focused role

Strong analytical and quantitative skills, including statistical analysis

Advanced proficiency in Microsoft Excel, with working knowledge of Word and PowerPoint

Experience with research or survey platforms (e.g. Q Research Software or similar)

Familiarity with online survey tools such as SurveyMonkey

Experience with data processing, databases, and large datasets

Experience using statistical software (preferably SPSS)

Experience scripting and working with online data collection tools



Why Join This Role

Work with international clients across diverse industries

Be part of a collaborative, insight-driven team

Opportunity to grow your analytical and consulting skillset

Remote-friendly, performance-focused culture

title: Accountant (Multi-Entity)
description:
Role Purpose

To manage the daily accounting function across multiple TBD entities, ensuring invoices are processed, payments are collected, accounts are reconciled, and financial statements are prepared accurately and on time.

The Arrangement

This is a results-based engagement, not an hours-based one. The work needs to be completed each morning once Xero has updated overnight. As long as the work is done and I can see results, the exact timing within the morning window is flexible.

•Service window: 8:00am - 10:00am AEST (approximate)

•Flexibility within that window based on workload

•What matters: work is complete, accurate, and I can see the results

•No micromanagement of hours if outcomes are delivered



Primary Values



Highest Standards : Every figure is correct. Every reconciliation balances. Every statement is accurate. No sloppy work, no assumptions, no 'it's probably right'.



Ownership: You own the numbers. If something doesn't balance, you find out why. If a payment is missing, you chase it. You don't wait to be told there's a problem.



Deliver Results:  The work gets done every morning. Reports are ready when needed. Queries are resolved, not parked. Outcomes matter more than hours logged.





1 Accounts Receivable Generate and send all client invoices across multiple entities via Xero. Ensure accuracy of amounts, services, and client details. Chase overdue payments.

2 Accounts Payable Process supplier invoices, verify against purchase orders or approvals, schedule payments, and maintain accurate creditor records.

3 Debt Collection Actively chase outstanding debts. Request and follow up on statements. Resolve queries promptly. Escalate aged debt as per agreed thresholds.

4 Bank Reconciliation Reconcile all bank accounts daily once Xero updates. Identify and resolve discrepancies. No unmatched transactions left unaddressed.

5 Multi-Entity Management Manage accounts across Australian and UAE entities. Maintain clean separation between entities. Ensure intercompany transactions are properly recorded.

6 Statement Requests Request statements from suppliers and debtors as needed. Confirm balances. Identify and resolve any discrepancies between records.

7 Query Resolution Respond to and resolve queries from clients, suppliers, and internal stakeholders. Don't let queries sit. Own them until resolved.

8 Financial Statements Prepare monthly Profit & Loss and Balance Sheet for each entity. Ensure statements are accurate, complete, and delivered by agreed deadlines.

9 Month-End Close Complete month-end close procedures. Ensure all transactions are posted, accruals are recorded, and accounts are ready for reporting.



Requirements

Essential

•Strong Xero experience (this is non-negotiable)

•Experience managing accounts for multiple entities

•Ability to prepare financial statements (P&L, Balance Sheet)

•Experience with accounts receivable, accounts payable, and bank reconciliation

•Comfortable chasing payments and resolving queries professionally

•Reliable internet and quiet workspace

•Available within the 8:00am - 10:00am AEST service window

Desirable

•Accounting qualification (CPA, CA, or equivalent)

•Experience with Australian accounting standards (UAE experience a plus)

•Experience in a services or professional services business

What Success Looks Like

•Bank accounts reconciled daily, no unexplained items

•Invoices sent on time and accurately

•Debts chased proactively, not aged silently

•Queries resolved, not parked

•Financial statements ready when needed, accurate and complete

•I can see results each morning without having to ask

•Problems flagged early, not discovered later

The Non-Negotiables

•Accuracy is everything. If you're not sure, check. If you can't check, ask.

•Don't let things age silently. If a debt is overdue, chase it. If a query is unresolved, resolve it.

•Own your numbers. If something doesn't balance, it's your job to find out why.

•Communicate proactively. If there's a problem, I should hear it from you first.

•Results matter more than hours. Get the work done right, and the flexibility works both ways.

title: Amazon Private Label and PPC Specialist
description:
About the role

We are an Australian owned business with a UK based private label brand on Amazon.

You will be managing a UK marketplace private label brand for an Australian client.

We are looking for an experienced Amazon specialist in the Philippines to manage our advertising campaigns, support A plus content, and stay on top of performance every week. You will work closely with our creative team to brief and improve images and video so the brand stays competitive and profitable.



Key responsibilities

1. Campaign and ad management

Set up, manage, and optimise Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display campaigns.

Monitor Amazon Ads and Ad Console several times per week within your agreed hours.

Adjust bids, budgets, and targeting to reach ACOS and TACOS targets.

Manage keyword research, search term reports, and negative keywords.

Run regular tests on creatives, headlines, and placements.

2. Private label brand management

Work only on our private label listings, not arbitrage or wholesale.

Review competitor listings, pricing, and offers on the UK marketplace.

Suggest changes to offers, pricing, and promotions based on data.

Coordinate with the team on review strategy and listing quality.

3. A plus content and listings

Review current listings and A plus content for clarity, keyword coverage, and conversion.

Brief the creative team on images, infographics, comparison charts, and brand story modules.

Check uploads on Amazon once the creative team delivers the assets.

Suggest ongoing improvements based on performance data.

4. Creative and video ads

Plan what image and video assets are needed for ads and product detail pages.

Provide clear briefs to designers and video editors with examples and references.

Review final assets before upload and confirm they meet Amazon guidelines.

Monitor performance of video ads and propose changes when needed.

5. Reporting and optimisation

Prepare a short weekly performance summary with key numbers, including ACOS, TACOS, ad spend, sales, best and worst performers, and search terms.

Flag any issues early, including sudden drops in performance or policy warnings.

Keep simple dashboards or spreadsheets up to date.



Skills and experience

Strong experience managing Amazon Ads for private label brands, with at least one year of hands on experience in Amazon PPC and Ad Console.

Confident in managing Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display.

Confident in keyword research and search term analysis.

Experience with bid and budget optimisation and negative keyword strategy.

Good understanding of listing optimisation, including titles, bullet points, images, and A plus content.

Experience working with a creative team and giving clear, structured briefs.

Strong Excel or Google Sheets skills for basic reports and analysis.

Experience with tools such as Helium 10, Jungle Scout, Data Dive, or similar.

Strong English reading and writing skills, with a focus on UK marketplace wording.

Personal qualities

Proactive and organised, always aware of campaign performance.

Detail focused, especially with numbers, bids, and budgets.

Comfortable working independently with light supervision.

Clear and direct communicator, able to explain needs and findings to the creative and leadership team.

Strong sense of ownership for results and ad spend.



Hours and working pattern

Approximately 3 to 5 hours per week to start.

Flexible schedule, as long as agreed weekly tasks and reporting are completed on time.

Potential for more hours as the brand grows and results improve.

Benefits

Work from home, long term role for the right person.

Stable client based in Australia with growth plans in the UK marketplace.

Opportunity to grow hours and responsibilities over time.

title: Call Center Transfer Agent
description:
JOB OVERVIEW

As a Transfer Agent, you will play a crucial role in facilitating outbound phone sales and transferring customers to the appropriate departments to meet their specific needs. We are looking for a candidate with exceptional English language skills, previous outbound phone sales experience, and a background in transfer agent responsibilities.



Responsibilities:

Conduct outbound phone sales calls to prospective customers, verify information and qualify client

Engage customers in a courteous and friendly manner, actively listening to their inquiries and requirements.

Determine the customers' needs and identify the most suitable department for transferring the call.

Efficiently transfer calls to the designated department or representative while ensuring seamless communication.

Maintain accurate records of transferred calls and any relevant customer information.

Collaborate effectively with tea
mbers to optimize the call center's overall performance and customer satisfaction.

Handle a high volume of calls in a fast-paced environment while adhering to quality and efficiency standards.

Keep up-to-date with product/service knowledge and stay informed about company promotions and offers.

Utilize effective sales techniques to increase conversion rates and achieve individual and team targets.

Provide feedback and suggestions for process improvement to enhance overall call center efficiency.



Requirements:

Exceptional English language skills, both verbal and written, to communicate effectively with English-speaking customers.

Proven experience in outbound phone sales, demonstrating the ability to close deals successfully.

Previous experience as a Transfer Agent or in a similar role, with a track record of efficiently transferring calls to the appropriate departments.

Availability to work full-time on an overnight shift, from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST (Pacific Standard Time).

Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage time effectively in a high-pressure environment.

Tech-savvy and proficient in using call center software and CRM systems.

A proactive and adaptable attitude, willing to take on challenges and meet targets consistently.

Ability to submit examples of prior work, including recordings of voice for assessment purposes

Immediate availability to start working with our team.

title: Short-Form Video Editor
description:
First… the part to impress you.

Timothy Armoo is a serial entrepreneur who built and sold Fanbytes for a multi eight-figure

sum at 27. He now runs Legon Media - a content and media business that builds, scales and

sells companies.

He has an audience of 750,000+ founders, operators and ambitious professionals globally.

He’s also the author of What’s Stopping You, a Sunday Times Bestseller.

Now onto the important part.

We’re hiring a Short-Form Video Editor to own high-performance editing for Reels, TikToks

and YouTube Shorts. This is not basic editing. This is about speed, retention and output.

What You’ll Be Doing

Editing & Output

? Edit high-retention short-form videos

? Craft strong hooks (first 1–3 seconds matter)

? Add captions, pattern interrupts, pacing and b-roll

? Turn long-form content into multiple short clips

? Deliver consistent weekly volume

Speed & Standards

? Fast turnaround times

? Clean revisions

? High-quality output without bottlenecks

? Operate independently and hit deadlines

Platform Awareness

? Understand what performs on Reels, TikTok and Shorts

? Edit natively for each platform

? Apply trends intelligently

What Success Looks Like (First 60 Days)

? Consistent weekly short-form output

? Stronger hooks and sharper pacing

? Faster turnaround times

? Increased views, watch time and engagement

What We’re Looking For

? Proven experience editing short-form content

? A strong portfolio of high-performing clips

? Deep understanding of retention and pacing

? Skilled in Premiere Pro, Final Cut, CapCut or similar

? Comfortable working remotely at speed

This Role Isn’t For You If

? You’re slow with edits

? You need constant direction

? You prioritise fancy over effective

? You struggle with deadlines

How to Apply

Answer the following questions:

1. Share 3–5 short-form videos you’ve edited (include results if possible).

2. How do you optimise the first 3 seconds?

3. How quickly can you turn around 10 clips?

4. What software do you use and why?

Location: Remote

Competitive base + performance bonus

This is a role for someone who thrives on precision, structure, and fast-paced legal work — not a stepping-stone, but a long-term opportunity to deepen your expertise in family law drafting.

Qualifications & Skills

? Strong understanding of Australian family law, including divorce applications, consent orders, and financial agreements

? Proficiency in Clio or similar legal practice management software is highly preferred

? Exceptional written English and legal drafting skills

? Strong personal systems for managing volume work without sacrificing accuracy

? Responsive, professional, and collaborative team player

? Detail-focused: understands the risk of even small errors in legal drafting

? Comfortable adopting new tools and workflows (training provided)

? Stable remote setup (own computer, reliable internet; second monitor strongly preferred for speed and accuracy)

Work Environment & Schedule

? Remote, full-time role

? Based on Melbourne time

? Communication via Microsoft Teams chat and
, plus occasional calls as required by firm policy

? Embedded in a tight-knit legal team; reports to internal staff based in Australia



Cultural Fit

title: Conveyancing Paralegal
description:
Conveyancing Legal Assistant

Full-Time | Remote | Based in the Philippines | Australian Eastern Daylight Time

Monthly Salary: PHP 45,000

Apply Here:



About the Role

We’re seeking a highly detail-oriented and dependable Conveyancing Legal Assistant to support a high-volume property law practice based in Australia. This is a full-time, remote role ideal for someone with prior conveyancing experience who thrives on accuracy, speed, and structure. Your work will directly support conveyancers, ensuring that legal files are processed on time, accurately, and in alignment with the firm’s longstanding referral relationships.



Key Responsibilities

- Review and manage compliance documents such as Verification of Identity, authority forms, and client disclosure statements

- Monitor key deadlines (e.g., finance and deposit dates) and ensure timely follow-through

- Draft and send routine correspondence, including property notifications and settlement
s

- Accurately update legal files and contracts in Smokeball (legal database software)

- Coordinate with internal conveyancers and escalate issues when needed

- Maintain strict adherence to each referral group’s protocols to protect key partnerships

- Deliver zero-defect documentation — accuracy is critical to avoid legal missteps or reputational risk

- Stay on top of daily tasks through structured task lists in the firm’s legal workflow system



Qualifications & Skills

- 1–2 years of hands-on experience supporting conveyancing files or working in conveyancing law

- Strong understanding of Australian conveyancing processes, especially Contracts of Sale

- Excellent attention to detail and ability to maintain 100?curacy

- Strong written English and confidence in professional communication

- Proficiency in Microsoft Outlook and comfort using legal software (Smokeball preferred)

- Reliable and proactive; takes ownership and doesn’t wait to be told what to do

- Able to work with minimal supervision and meet daily deadlines in a fast-paced environment



Work Environment & Schedule

- Remote, full-time role

- Hours: 8:30 AM – 5:00 PM AEDT (Australian Eastern Daylight Time)

- Communication via Microsoft Teams chat — no phone calls required

- Embedded in a tight-knit legal team; reports to file handlers on-site in Australia



Cultural Fit

The ideal candidate is loyal, low-drama, and thrives in routine. You must be a “doer” — someone who completes tasks with precision, takes initiative, and doesn’t get derailed by feedback or pressure. This is a role for someone who finds satisfaction in getting the details right, every time.

Full-Time | Remote | Based in the Philippines | Australian Eastern Daylight Time

Monthly Salary: PHP 45,000
